reviews.author: Sadie Mcellis
reviews.text: so happy with this place. the people here are fantastic, the units are beautiful, the property is also beautiful and it’s in an amazing location. so happy to call this place my home. erika is absolutely awesome and made our move in process so easy. I also love the fact that there’s community events & tasty food trucks that come by. couldn’t be happier 😁
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a month ago
We deeply cherish your kind words about our community, beautiful units, and Erika's excellent service during move-in!

reviews.author: Brandi McCrite
reviews.text: We've enjoyed living here for a few years, it has a beautiful view on the north side. Close to a great HEB, IKEA, and the outlet stores. There's a cute resident computer area with a coffee machine, dog washing station, and two grassy dog yards. The maintenance crew are very kind.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a month ago
Thank you for your kind review! We’re so happy to hear you’ve enjoyed living here and appreciate the views, convenient location, and our resident amenities. We’ll be sure to share your compliments with our maintenance team—we’re grateful to have you as part of our community!

reviews.author: Danielle Hennessy
reviews.text: I toured Parkside at Round Rock and fell in love right away! The staff were super nice and made everything so easy — from the tour to getting my keys on move-in day. My apartment was clean, just like what I saw when I toured, and everyone has been so welcoming. It really feels like home already! Highly recommend checking it out if you’re apartment hunting.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 months ago
Thank you so much, Danielle! We’re thrilled to hear that you fell in love with Parkside at Round Rock from the very start. Our team works hard to make the touring and move-in process smooth and welcoming, and we’re so glad your apartment was exactly what you expected. It means a lot to know it already feels like home. Thank you for the recommendation — we’re happy to have you as part of the community!

reviews.author: Caitie Boland
reviews.text:
I toured Parkside at Round Rock and instantly knew it was where I wanted to live! The team made the whole process so easy — from scheduling my tour to move-in day, everything was smooth and well-organized. The community looked exactly like the photos (which isn’t always the case elsewhere), and the apartment was spotless when I moved in.

Everyone I met during the process was welcoming and professional, and they made me feel right at home from day one. I’d definitely recommend touring Parkside if you’re looking for a beautiful, well-kept place with a team that truly cares about residents.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 months ago
Thank you so much, Caitie! We’re thrilled to hear that your experience—from touring to move-in—was smooth and welcoming. Our team works hard to make sure everything is exactly as represented and that our new residents feel right at home from day one. We’re so happy you chose Parkside at Round Rock, and we truly appreciate your recommendation. Welcome home!

reviews.author: Shobin shanko
reviews.text: Ever since this apartment complex got acquired in August, they have not been professional nor consistent in their remarks. I tried to give them some grace and the benefit of the doubt but it had been over two months since I was owed my deposit and I have yet to receive it. I have been either given the run around and told I would get a call back (which I didn’t) or I’m asked to email them and they never respond back. I have evidence of the emails where they didn’t respond and call recordings with contradictions Aboit when they sent out the check. I will update this thread when I finally get a response and my refund. Used to be a great place to live, completely different experience. Also, they said I owed them money until I showed them that I paid my rent. I’m sure if I took this long to pay them, it wouldn’t be acceptable. Lastly, it seems like a breach of contract in their reimbursement method because it changed from what it was before when I signed.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 months ago
Hi Shobin, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We’re very sorry for the frustration you experienced during this transition period. We understand how important timely communication and accurate information are, and we apologize that your experience did not reflect the level of service we strive to provide.

We’re glad to share that your refund has now been processed and sent. If you have any additional questions or need further assistance, please feel free to contact our team directly at parkside@kairoi.com so we can help right away.

We appreciate your patience and the opportunity to make this right.

reviews.author: Constance Tobar
reviews.text: The property is clean, well-maintained, and in a great location, but what really made the process exceptional was Erika. She was patient, knowledgeable, and incredibly responsive from the moment I toured the building. Erika took the time to explain every detail, answered all of my questions, and made the entire process smooth. It's rare to find someone so professional and genuinely kind. I absolutely recommend this community—and if you can, ask for Erika.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 months ago
Hi Constance, Thank you so much for this amazing review! We’re thrilled to hear that your experience was exceptional and that Erika made such a positive impact throughout your tour and leasing process. She truly embodies professionalism, kindness, and a commitment to ensuring every detail is understood and every question is answered.

We’re grateful to have her on our team, and we’re even more grateful to have you as part of our community. Thank you for recommending Parkside at Round Rock—we’re here for anything you need!

reviews.author: Michael Burks
reviews.text: This complex has been extremely inconsistent after a lousy turnover from the previous property group. Staff are rude to tenants and email language to tenants is passive aggressive for things outside of their control. An example recently was from a notice of external facing doors of the property and a message was sent out saying tenants would be liable if found to leave the doors open.  The catch though - the doors are broken. Some don't even have a Spring Hinge/Self Closing Gate Hinge. They also don't work with the key fobs. Highly recommend any tenant to look elsewhere.

reviews.author: jessica mcmillan
reviews.text: Carlie is amazing, she is professional and kind and makes the leasing process so smooth. If you are searching for an apartment talk to Carlie she will help you find the perfect home
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 months ago
Hi Jessica, Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We’re thrilled to hear Carlie made your experience smooth and enjoyable—she truly has a gift for helping people feel at home. We appreciate you taking the time to share your recommendation!

reviews.author: ibeth león
reviews.text: Carlie is amazing. Helps you find the perfect home and makes the process so smooth. Answers all the questions you have and has an amazing personality!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 months ago
Hi Ibeth, Thank you for the wonderful review! We’re so glad to hear that Carlie provided such a smooth and helpful experience during your search. She is a fantastic part of our team, and we’re happy she was able to help you find the perfect home. We appreciate you sharing your feedback!

reviews.author: Christina Renken
reviews.text: My daughter just leased here and made her decision wholly based on the customer service from the front office. Andrea was so helpful and informative, The property is gorgeous, she can’t wait to move in!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 months ago
Hi Christina, Thank you so much for sharing this wonderful feedback! We’re thrilled to hear that your daughter had such a positive experience and that our team was able to provide the support and information she needed. We’re excited to welcome her to Parkside, and we’re here for anything she may need throughout her move-in and beyond. Thank you again for your kind words!

reviews.author: Chelsea Read
reviews.text: Casey helped us find our new home.  She helped us understand all of our options and didn't rush us in our choice.  She responded to our questions promptly and had so much patience during our process.

reviews.author: Chris Jackson
reviews.text: I stopped by during some sort of event last week and man was it a wonderful looking event. I spoke to Casey about potentially moving here whenever my current lease is up. She was extremely nice and informal. While I couldn’t do a tour due to it being after hours already, she still was able to provide me with plenty of info. She then told me I could stay and enjoy the party which I obliged. This appears to be a great community run by even better people. Can’t wait till I am able to move here.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 7 months ago
Hi Chris!

Thank you so much for your kind words! We’re thrilled to hear you stopped by during our recent event and had such a positive experience. It’s great to know that Casey was able to assist you and provide helpful information—even after hours! We do our best to always provide a 5-star experience. 

We’re glad you chose to stay and enjoy the festivities with us. Creating a welcoming and fun community is something we truly value, and it means a lot to hear that it came across during your visit.

We can’t wait to welcome you as a future resident when the time is right! If you have any questions in the meantime or would like to schedule a tour when it works for you, don’t hesitate to reach out.

reviews.author: Amy Henry
reviews.text:
The parking is horrible. The trash situation is horrible.  The communication with the staff is horrible.  They are not willing to work with you in any way possible. They are always sending emails threatening to shut down the pool because tenants are not acting like adults and cleaning up after themselves.  So I guess that's everybody's fault when we pay rent for the amenity of using the pool. Please invest in training your staff and maybe getting some more professional people to run the office.

This community has gone downhill in the last three years since Greystar has taken over.  The hallway is always really dirty and smells like weed which is ridiculous for a non smoking complex.
You shouldn't have to pay $35 for a reserved parking spot!!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 7 months ago
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts. We’re truly sorry to hear that you’ve been feeling this way, and we want you to know that your concerns are heard and taken seriously.

We understand how important things like parking, cleanliness, and communication are to your living experience. That’s exactly why we implemented reserved parking and towing over a year ago — to help ensure our residents have better access to the garage and that those spaces are respected.

We also want to reassure you that we never charge for amenities, and our goal is for everyone to be able to enjoy spaces like the pool. Any community reminders are meant to protect those shared experiences, not to place blame.

As for the hallways and overall building care, we’re continuing to take steps to improve cleanliness and reinforce our non-smoking policies — because we want Parkside to feel like home for every resident.

We know the past few years have come with challenges, and while we may not always get it right the first time, we truly care and are constantly working to do better. If you ever feel comfortable reaching out, we’d love the chance to connect and see how we can improve your experience.

Warmly,
Parkside at Round Rock

reviews.author: Phuong Bui
reviews.text: Lived here for 17 months (paid for 15 months with a 2-month special) and can’t really complain. Appliances, the 24/7 gym, prompt valet trash, the ease of access to a garage are all high quality and really factored my decision in living here. The apartment is centered with lots of shopping and eats nearby so there was nothing short of boredom. Andrew and Bella were helpful when I first moved in, Alyssa helped me with any maintenance requests I had, and Valerie was transparent in helping me move out. I had a faulty kitchen sink faucet once and the next day, maintenance replaced the entire faucet with a brand new one. You definitely pay for the experience here as well, as management continues to truck out monthly events and food trucks. Overall, a worthy stay for its price which is affordable for its area.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 8 months ago
Thank you Phuong! We are so glad you enjoyed everything! We were so sad to see you go!

reviews.author: Alyssa Iannone
reviews.text:
I've been living at Parkside at Round Rock for about a year now and I can’t recommend it enough! The customer service here is truly outstanding. From the moment I moved in, the leasing agent, assistant manager, and property manager have gone above and beyond to make sure all my needs are met. They’re incredibly attentive, always ready to help with a smile, which really makes a difference in the overall experience of living here.

The apartments themselves are spacious and well-designed, offering fantastic value for the price. I love how much room I have to spread out, and the layouts are perfect for both relaxation and entertaining.

One of my favorite features is the dog park! It’s a wonderful space where my pups can play and socialize with other dogs. Plus, the dog wash stations are a lifesaver—no more messy baths at home after a fun day at the park!

The fitness center is another highlight, equipped with high-quality machines and plenty of space to work out. It’s always clean and well-maintained, making it easy to stick to my fitness goals.

The location is also ideal. It’s conveniently situated near shops, restaurants, and parks, making it easy to get out and enjoy everything the area has to offer.

Overall, I love living here at Parkside! It feels like a community, and I’m grateful for the friendly staff and great amenities. If you’re considering a new place to live, definitely check this place out!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Thank you Alyssa! We have all the best amenities and thank you for being a valued resident.

reviews.author: Amanda Renee
reviews.text: The new team at Parkside round rock is incredible. Andrew, Valerie , Bella and Alyssa have all gone above and beyond to make this such an easy process to apply and move into these beautiful homes!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Thanks for the great feedback, Amanda!  We appreciate the detailed review and welcome you to the community!  We are glad you made Parkside your home and look forward to having you here!

reviews.author: Mimi Way
reviews.text: Andrea is amazing and so sweet! Chrissie is on top of any repairs and is super knowledgeable about what shes doing. 10/10
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 months ago
Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear about your great experience with Andrea and Chrissie. Their dedication to our residents really shows, and we appreciate you being part of our community!

reviews.author: Max Lowell
reviews.text: Just renewed my lease for another year all the staff and management are wonderful and are always ready to answer any and all of my questions. The Maintinence team are #1 speaking of Maintinence, big shout out to Michael. Even off the clock if I run into him, he's always willing to help. He even helped me move in at one point and I didn't even know he worked there!Come here if you're looking for quality living.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 7 months ago
HI Maxwell! 
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience and for renewing your lease with us for another year! We're thrilled to hear that our team has been helpful and responsive to your needs — and we couldn’t agree more about how amazing Michael is! We’re lucky to have him and are so glad he made such a great impression. It means a lot to know you feel at home here at Parkside. Here's to another great year ahead!

reviews.author: Marvin
reviews.text: Have only lived here a couple of weeks but the experience has been great. The location is 10/10 with access to pretty much everything, the property has been clean since we've lived here, the gym is clean and pretty much has anything you would need for a normal workout and the pool area is great. So far we have only had the pleasure of working with Alyssa from the staff and she has been absolutely awesome!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 10 months ago
Thank you Marvin! Alyssa is amazing and so glad you are having the best time.

reviews.author: Curl Goddezz
reviews.text: The staff is super sweet, the community events 10/10 and maintenance is also so quick to help with a problem. Honestly the gym is one of my favorite parts and the fact it is open 24/7 i loveee. I’m excited for when the pool opens back up and maybe more movie nights at the pool.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 9 months ago
Thank you Curl! Best event planners in Round Rock! One coming up soon!

reviews.author: Stephanee Lund
reviews.text: We tried to take a tour today, but we were told that the associate couldn't give us a tour because she had an appointment booked at 2:30. It was only 2:00 pm, I'm not sure why a quick look couldn't happen in 30 minutes, but hey. We drove in from Houston, and it's kind of difficult to make an appointment with every single complex you want to tour. We didn't know how long each would take or how far apart they are, we'd never even visited the area. Needless to say I'm not taking another three hour drive to check out Parkside, but thank you.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 7 months ago
Hello Stephanee, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We're very sorry to hear that your visit to Parkside didn’t go as planned — especially after making the long trip from Houston. We completely understand how frustrating this must have been. 

While we do our best to accommodate all walk-in visitors, we also want to make sure we’re providing our full attention to each scheduled appointment. In this case, it sounds like we missed an opportunity to help make your visit more seamless, and for that, we sincerely apologize. Our leasing agent did provide you with pricing and offered videos of our community while in office. I know our schedules didn't seem to align for an ideal time to reschedule a tour. 

We truly value your interest in our community and would love the chance to reconnect if you're ever in the area again or open to a virtual tour. Please feel free to reach out directly at 512-388-5000, or Parksiderr@greystar.com — we'd be happy to find a time that works for you and ensure your next experience is a positive one.

reviews.author: Devin Winfield
reviews.text: First of all can’t say more good things about the team at Parkside ! Every member makes you feel welcomed and like you’re already living at home. They helped me get exactly what I was looking for in a place to settle down. I was personally helped by Alyssa and she was hands down the most attentive and helpful person I’ve ever had the pleasure of working with. Her attention to detail and kindness was outstanding! Definitely recommend living here !
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Thank you Devin! Very kind words to the team! They will love reading this!

reviews.author: Diana Garcia
reviews.text: I can’t say enough about Casey’s attention and assistance during our process!! We just relocated from NJ and couldn’t find a place to live until we got to PRR and met her! She made everything feel smooth and fast.  So far we are loving the apartament and amenities and ofcourse the city!!!!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 10 months ago
Welcome to Texas! So glad you chose us and this area! It truly is a great spot! Casey is awesome too!

reviews.author: Shelby Lowe
reviews.text:
Edit: we have finally payed off all of the expenses after about 90 days of payments to this apartment. I hope this review has helped keep the potential residents informed on what this apartment does to people during a pandemic.
Edit: In reply to managements comment. We used to live at a sister property to this complex. We transfered our lease to Parkside for the job opportunities. We were led to believe that we would be having the exact same lease since both properties were owned by the same person and managed by Lincoln. We new that the lease breaking for the other property would be one months rent and a 30 day notice. We were under the impression that they had given us the exact same rules and lease transfer points. We both know we should have read more into the small print and finer points. But, we were too trusting of the company. Even now, there is still miscommunication between the team and leaders. We were told we could leave our keys and they would still allow us to pay the 60 day notice for each month's rent. Then we receive an email stating that if we left them our keys they want the extra $3000 immediately. We aren't asking for our money back. But, we want to keep others from making the same mistake we did and being screwed out of a lot of money during these times.

You should avoid Parkside at all costs. They take advantage of the pandemic and people losing jobs. My husband and I moved to Parkside for work. But, due to Covid, we are now having to relocate to Ohio. Parkside has demanded more then $7000 from us. Due to circumstances, our jobs are not able to help relocate. We owe more then $7000 after they have taken our deposits.  We are not the only ones, we have neighbors getting ready to take out loans so that they can provide for their family so that they can relocate for work. We tried talking to them to let them know we needed to relocate for jobs. They would not work with us. We asked if we could transfer our lease and were refused. Because of the Pandemic, they have revoked the ability to transfer to sister properties. This place is taking advantage of those being affected by Covid. This is such a bad company and apartment. We asked if we could set up a payment plan, and Ty in Leasing said he would ask corporate and ghosted us. I cannot voice how horrible this complex is. If you move here. Make sure to check every hidden fee as well as do not be in a situation of having to relocate due to jobs, family, and Covid. Also, we were the first ones living in the apartment.  And you can see how cheaply it is put together. We have had pants torn as well as cuts to ourselves and our dogs due to exposed painted over nails. Our cabinets lost their handles, and the drywall looks as if it is falling off the walls.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner Edited 5 years ago
Dear Shelby, our team was sorry to hear of your plans for early move-out as you and your husband have been valued residents of our community. A team member has reached out to help answer any questions or concerns over your move-out and we hope you have all of your concerns addressed.  Please know that our team is striving to offer a high level of customer care, so we hope to speak with you again soon. Thank you!

reviews.author: Samantha S
reviews.text: I lived in the townhomes (3113) at Parkside from 2022-2023 and although it’s beautiful property and I enjoyed my townhome, I am highly displeased with the property management process of returning our refundable deposit. As previous tenants stated, the property management changed a few times while living there & after move out it took 9 MONTHS to receive not even half of our security deposit. We left the unit spotless, professionally cleaned. They charge luxury prices but not a luxury experience!! Pitiful. They made it so difficult to get in contact with those in charge of returning deposits. I would call, email, left voicemails to property and the management company with no solution or help for 9months!!!! Ridiculous!! Also beware of the Ant problem it’s true- 2 of our bedrooms and living room became infested with ants! It was terrible. Dog poop everywhere when walking around the property as well. If you have kids beware of the speeding in/near parking garage. They never ever had security gates put up either during that time which lead to theft of our property in Jan 2023. Hopefully some changes have been made- Beware!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Hi! Apologies for the bad experience. We always enjoy feedback to make us better. Thank you and we will take this review and share with team.

reviews.author: Karen Zuleta
reviews.text: When I moved here this place wasn’t like that. It was brand new and maybe that was the reason I found everything perfect. But now is horrible, so dirty, the mail room doesn’t work so you have to pick your package at the office what means you can only pick your package when the office is open. The office people almost never answer the phone calls. I don’t want to talk about the trash that you can find in the garage because is just to much and even when they tried to solved the problem with the big trash cans they put there it didn’t work. I don’t know what kind of people is moving here but seriously this place is just getting worse and worse. The Aparment can look okay, because seriously I have no problem with my apartment I think is perfect but the property management need work
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Karen, Thanks for rating your experience. We are looking into this issue and hope to resolve it promptly and accurately. Please take a moment to contact us so we can discuss your concerns at parksideroundrock@avenue5apt.com. Respectfully, Parkside at Round Rock Staff

reviews.author: Katie McCoy
reviews.text: I came to visit a friend and stopped in the office for some assistance on where to go and I have to give a huge shout out to Alyssa! She was so sweet and helpful with directions for the easiest route! Although I am not currently looking for a new home, I am definitely considering moving to Parkside Round Rock when my lease is up, just based on my experience with her alone!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Thank you! Alyssa is a rockstar! We will love to have you!

reviews.author: Sam Greenberg
reviews.text: If I could give this place 0 stars I would. This was the worst living experience I’ve ever paid for in my life. I had to deal with a terrible ant infestation that persisted the entirety of my lease with the complex. Management NEVER fixed the situation, despite me asking AT LEAST a dozen times for them to find me a better pest treatment. The apartment was built cheaply too, and the walls and paint would easily dirty. There was no way to wash or remove the stains, unless you wanted create further damage. On top of this, my bike was STOLEN out of the community bike storage room, even though I had it locked up. This bike room was first advertised to me as a complex amenity while taking a tour of the place. WHAT A JOKE. I never understood why there was a key card entry for the gym but not the bike room…? There was even a security camera in the entree way of the building the bike room is in—and still nothing was done by management to review footage and help me solve the theft. I had to file a police report and tried asking management to send me video footage from the security camera but I, along with the officer on my case, got nothing but RADIO SILENCE from the complex. They then lied to me about returning the officer’s call. Management failed me in so many ways during my stay that the only thing I can do to feel better is to warn others. Don’t live here! Don't fall for B.S. amenities they sell you. Your money is best spent somewhere else.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Hello Samantha, 

I do apologize for the experience you had. I do know the staff is always super efficient with getting issues resolved and vendors are hired when needed. We love the style of the units and enjoy showing all the apartments to future prospects. Thank you for the review and we apologize that your experience was not up to our standards.

reviews.author: anabelle_xoxx
reviews.text: This place wants to take your money. We moved out August 2024. We got a bill in September charging us a ridiculous amount of money and for what? Never explained what it was for and every time I call they say they will follow back and NEVER DO until I get another bill and have to do the whole thing over again. Now they sent it to collections!?!? Super unprofessional
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 7 months ago
Anabelle,
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We're truly sorry to hear about your experience and understand how frustrating this situation must be.  At Parkside at Round Rock, we aim to be as transparent and responsive as possible, especially during the move-out process. We sincerely apologize for any confusion or delays in communication regarding your final statement. Please know that we have been actively working with our accounting department to review your account in detail and obtain clear answers regarding the charges.

We understand your concern, and we want to assure you that we are committed to resolving this. You can expect to hear from us shortly with a follow-up once we have the full information needed to address everything appropriately. In the meantime, if you have any questions or would like to speak directly, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our office at 512-388-5000 or email us at Parksiderr@greystar.com We appreciate your patience and the opportunity to make this right.

reviews.author: Nicole Buford
reviews.text: As a newer apartment locator, I am in contact with numerous communities, constantly. Parkside and the team here have been nothing but kind and professional answering all of my constant questions. Alyssa especially is one of the most knowledgeable leasing professionals about this area. The other leasing professional, Casey is so kind!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Thank you for the kind words! Alyssa and Casey are amazing!

reviews.author: Hilary Hooten
reviews.text: I toured Parkside this past weekend & had such a great experience! Casey in the office was so helpful & friendly and the gym & pool area were beautiful! I’m not looking to move for a while, but Parkside is definitely one of my top contenders! :)
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Thank you Hillary! Keep us in mind when it is time! You will love this place!

reviews.author: Johnny Howard
reviews.text: I have lived in this complex for nearly 4 years now and have a few changes in ownership.  I do believe that the current staff from Greystar have been the best.  They are very kind and accommodating.  They respond quickly to requests and have a good grasp on what it takes to responsibly manage a property like the Parkside complex.  Every interaction I have had with anyone from the team has been very positive thus far.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Thank you Johnny! Greystar and this team take pride in doing it the right way!

reviews.author: Legal Latino Heat
reviews.text: If your car gets towed it will be $400 even if you register it on R2. It seems if you register it makes it a target for towing because they will know what to look for.  If you park on the 4th floor hail will damage your car. Garbage everywhere dirty staircases and hallway. Paying $50 for Valet trash you expect the place to be cleaner. Pretty sure there are rats are around to chew through the paper thin walls with fast food trash all around the garage and halls. Loud dogs bark all day and night.  Pests and gnats in your apartment. Red ants in between the walls during the summer coming out the outlets. They charge $25 for useless fetch delivery services. So expect your rent to go up another $300 from listing price with all the extra fees. With the new apartment developments on N Mays pay a little extra for something new with better amenities. Parkside is cheaply constructed and notice the cracks on ceiling and walls.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Legal Latino Heat - I'm disappointed to hear you had a negative experience at our community. If there's anything else you'd like to share, please don't hesitate to contact us directly.

reviews.author: Kevin Remsen
reviews.text:
I recently toured an apartment with Alyssa at Parkside at Round Rock, and I couldn't have been more impressed with her professionalism and expertise. From the moment we met, Alyssa greeted me with a warm and friendly demeanor, making me feel right at home. She took the time to listen to my needs and preferences, and showed me several units that met my criteria.
Overall, I was extremely impressed with Alyssa's level of service and professionalism. She made my apartment search stress-free and enjoyable, and I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a new place to call home. Thank you, Alyssa and Parkside at Round Rock, for a great experience
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Kevin Remsen, we're glad to hear you enjoyed your visit and tour with Alyssa.  We try to impress every new guest and are happy that she could provide you that experience!  Thank you so much for the great review!

reviews.author: bri rankin
reviews.text: I just moved in recently and I absolutely love my apartment! I have no problems with anything and the new team is quick to inform us of any inconveniences that we may have. I have been down to the office multiple times and Bella is always there to help me out with things! She is super nice and she is always open to have a conversation! I definitely recommend Parkside as your new home because I couldn’t be happier here!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Hey Bri, welcome to the community and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review!  We appreciate that you selected Parkside at Round Rock to be your new home and look forward to working with you in the future!

reviews.author: Jordan Hart
reviews.text: Apartment hunting can be really stressful but Casey definitely made it easier. She was incredibly friendly and professional. It was honestly the best tour that my wife and I have had and we've toured over 20 apartments. Thank You, Casey!
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Thank you! Casey rocks! She is so kind and a key piece to Parkside!

reviews.author: Z C (Chucky2sRevenge)
reviews.text: You might think this complex looks nice and is in a good area, but once you pull into it you'll notice the gates do not work.  Anyone can drive in and through the complex, despite them advertising as a private parking lot.  This has been the case since Avenue 5 has purchased the property back in June 2021.  They have not been able to get trash cleanup under control.  They have not fixed issues with the mail room and now they keep YOUR packages in their office.  This makes it super inconvenient to get your mail.  The dog park is sad and often taken over by the same groups of people with hostile dogs that force you to leave.  The parking garage is a danger because this property has no speed bumps or mirrors or signage.  People speed all the time through here.  You cannot smoke inside the property yet there are no smoking designated areas outside.  There has been zero improvements made and in fact, many amenities are now worthless or not working here.  Yet they have the nerve to raise rent on everyone?  Do yourself a huge favor and ignore or move out of this complex.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Hello Z, We appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. Please know that customer happiness is our top priority and we are upset this has not been your experience. When you have a moment please reach out to our team at parksideroundrock@avenue5apt.com so we can address your concerns. Kindest regards, Parkside at Round Rock Staff.

reviews.author: Deborah Yanez
reviews.text:
New update: Thank Noah, Benjamin, and Carlos responded our needs. The A/C unit fixed. They came in our apartment and checked no more debris from the vents. They showed their care for the residents like us. They made us very happy and we live in a normal and comfortable environment here that should be the way. Their entire team and patrol team are terrific. Blessings to them and they earn the good shoulder pats. Applauding for their sincere work. We appreciate that very much.
Older review: Max, Noah, and Stephanie at the leasing office have helped me to get some maintenance service at my apartment. The maintenance men, Benjamin and Carlos did a good job. Max, Noah, and Stephanie did a good job, too. All of them are friendly and I appreciate them. They deserve an applause and back pats. Thanks to all of them. Thumbs up.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Hello Deborah, We are grateful and appreciate the time you took to leave your review. If you ever need anything please don't hesitate to reach out to our team. Hope you visit us again soon!

reviews.author: B Marie
reviews.text: My husband and I had some issues with our heater during the freeze and the maint team got right on it. Alyssa was great with her communication and updates, putting our minds at ease. We’ve enjoyed the property overall, close to everything and fitness center is petty cool too.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Hello Marie, it's great to hear how we were able to meet your needs immediately!  We are happy that Alyssa and our maintenance team were able to address the issue and take care of you!  If you have any other needs, please feel free to reach out to us at the office!

reviews.author: Dago
reviews.text:
Don’t let the pictures fool you. Beware of paying bogus charges when moving out. While I lived here from 2021-2023 in apartment 1244, the ownership changed 3 times. Lincoln, Assurance, then Greystar. When I moved in, the carpets were installed incorrectly leaving hills (which they are charging me for). There were always issues with the trash valet. And now that I moved out, they are charging me for damages that I did not make. They are also trying to charge me for things that don’t appear damaged (the toilet photo). They even tried charging me for damage to my outside wall which people hit with furniture while moving in/out. I attached images of the items I tried to dispute with Sherron Joseph at Greystar but she would ignore my emails. Now they sent me to debt collections while still not responding to my questions. Shameful.

Update: I paid the remaining note from when I was sent to collections. They were non negotiable and would not respond to my emails prior to the deadline. I decided to pay because I am just a person and they are a huge corp that would drown me in legal bills when they sue me. I rather be homeless than live here again especially with the dispute process and giving nonsense charges.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Hello Dago, sorry it went as far to collections. We always try and resolve the issue before. We do see very minimal charges and payments not made at move out.  Please reach out to Greystar Receivables again to try and resolve the balance.

reviews.author: Beni L
reviews.text: I stopped by this place to inquire about an apartment for a friend... and had the pleasure of meeting Alyssa R. She was absolutely amazing, kind, knowledgeable, and  helpful. If you ever visit, don’t hesitate to ask for Alyssa 🙌 🙌 …
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 11 months ago
Hey! She is amazing! Thank you for the great shout out!

reviews.author: Francine Walden
reviews.text: Hello, I’ve been a resident at Parkside at round rock, I’m pleased with the interior and exterior. The pool is amazing you don’t have to bring anything but a towel, private seating area, and sitting area around the pool. Nice small and large dog play yard. I feel safe when I take a walk around the complex, that is very important for me and my family.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Hi Francine Walden, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Parkside at Round Rock. We're happy we could meet your expectations!

reviews.author: Rex -
reviews.text:
I have been here since it opened, watching the community fill up and grow. The staff before and the staff currently 2022 have always been super friendly, caring and want the very best for the residents. There is no perfect property but coming from many other apt communities with a lot more issues I am glad to call Parkside home.

Staff works very hard to keep up with everything and you are centrally located to any and everything you could want. Shopping, restaurants, gyms, movie theater, grocery stores and right off IH 35 or quick shot over to Toll 130. Really it is all within walking distance if you choose.  Two big dog parks for your fur kiddos and a super nice dog washing station.

The property is well thought out and the amenities are awesome. You won't need a gym membership or find a nicer pool area to enjoy right out side your front door. The apartments are spacious and offer many floor plans for your liking. Give it a TRY and you will find you are happy to call Parkside home as well.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Greetings DJ, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We're thrilled that the staff left such a great impression! We hope to continue exceeding your expectations with 5 star service. See you soon!

reviews.author: Zach Moore
reviews.text: Apartment quality isn't great, lots of unfinished items upon move in, staff seems to not care at all, getting mail is difficult and if you have a package you have about a 50% chance of actually getting it. Make sure any guests log in through the parking portal or they'll get towed, don't worry it's very tedious and annoying.  Maintenance guys are nice but busy and don't always get items resolved.  Don't know that they're worth the price but I have a small yard for my dog which is nice.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Zach, Thanks for rating your experience. I'm very sorry we failed to meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and support and hope you'll consider coming back in the future. Sincerely, Parkside at Round Rock Staff

reviews.author: James Irwin
reviews.text: Do not live here. I got one of their 'renovated' units and ever since I moved in I've had a bug problem. Constantly finding ants in every room. Bugs coming out of the air vents in my bedroom, ants coming out of the drains in my shower, etc. They have sent pest control many times and nothing has helped. I have begged for someone to come check behind the cabinets, walls, and in the air vents but they have not done a thing.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Hi James, I do apologize for the bad experience. I will make sure I come and take a look at everything and get it taken care of right away. Thank you.

reviews.author: Natasha Burkes
reviews.text: I’ve loved living in this apartment. The community feels safe and welcoming, quiet and the neighbors are kind. My unit is very spacious and any issues I’ve had were resolved within a day.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
We love this Natasha! So happy to have you here too!

reviews.author: Lance Champion
reviews.text: Park side is a delight! I visited this gorgeous apartment complex today and I absolutely love it! Casey and Alyssa took their time showing me around answering all of my questions with great clarity and depth. Can’t wait to move here.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Thank you John! Casey and Alyssa are amazing!

reviews.author: Laura Martochko
reviews.text:
This is the worst place to live!!! UNSAFE, DIRTY AND WITH THE WORST MANAGEMENT. My car was hit in the residents parking lot and they never offered to help me!! No one responded for the damage and the parking lot has no control over who enters or leaves the place. The damage was $2000 and nobody responded. Apart from that, park dogs live broken, dirty and full of poop.

The tow company tows cars all the time!! They towed my car even though I had registered it and parked it correctly.

the management and the lease office are too unprofessional. They never respond for anything and do not take care of the residents!! The only answer is “send us a mail” that is not gonna be answered never
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Laura Casallas, it is disappointing for us to hear that your experience was anything less than great.  We appreciate you bringing this experience to our attention, as we are always looking for ways to improve.  Thank you for the feedback!

reviews.author: Madison Benedetti
reviews.text: Our apartments AC was broken when we moved in and was disgusting. There was clothes still in the dryer and wash and toenail clippings in the bathroom. It was obvious it hadn’t been cleaned or even walked through despite it being a week after our move in date. Our apartment also towed my car without warning and did not let me know leading me to panicking at 7:00 in the morning with no way to get to college and calling the police to try and figure out hat happened to my car. Furthermore parking that used to be free now cost money if you want to park by the doors. I recently was contacted by management after posting this review to a company survey and they ensured me they would look into it and get back to me the next day about making it up to me. It’s been a week and they are no longer responding to my emails and have done nothing to rectify these issues.I heavily recommend thinking twice before leasing here.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Hello Madison, thank you for taking the time to leave your review. After looking into this further we did see your move in took place while Parkside was under different Management, and we're disappointed to hear of the negative experience you had. We appreciate you taking the time to speak with us in regard to the concerns of your apartment addressing your concerns. We wish you the best and thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback.

reviews.author: Eric Ayala
reviews.text: Honest review apartment was great when Lincoln ran. It was probably the best complex you could rent from at the time. About eight months after Avenue 5 took over, it was not the smoothest transition, and unfortunately, they let the community go down. It is not what it once was but have they ever done anything that directly affected my living? The answer is no things they could work on would be making sure staff can answer questions and are available to answer the phone. This was very frustrating. Also, the turnover was horrible maintenance seems like they could use a little better guidance as work orders were being closed out but not done. Also, instead of nitpicking about yards and what people put on them, how about fixing the more prominent issues the complex has had since Avenue 5 took over? Would I recommend living here? I would, but you will need a lot of patience and need to ignore the problems that this company still hasn't figured out yet. I would give this a solid 3/5, and that's just me being lucky enough never to have problems with my specific unit hope they get it together apartment still has a lot of potentials.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We sincerely apologize about the issues you experienced, and we hope to make this right. Can you please email us at parksideroundrock@avenue5apt.com to discuss how we could improve?

reviews.author: Mickey McDonald
reviews.text: Finding a new place to live recently has been very hard. Dealing with bad customer service over the phone with many other complexes. But parkside was amazing. Talking with Bella over the phone was extremely pleasant, and she told me everything I needed to know about living here.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
We sorry to hear about your negative experience with other communities but are happy that we could turn that experience around!  Thanks for choosing Parkside at Round Rock and we are happy that Bella could assist you!  Please feel free to reach out if you need any future assistance!

reviews.author: Katelyn hieatt
reviews.text:
Nice office staff.
The pool and gym are ok as well.
The biggest down side to living here is you can hear everything! the above neighbors are doing.
If you like your privacy and peace&quiet this is not the place for you.
Also, people drive way too fast in the parking garage and surrounding areas. So be careful when walking around especially if you have small children.

Units them selves seem to be built in a rush and fairly cheaply. Some cabinets are uneven and they are already showing chipping and some welting due to water from the sink. Areas of paint are chipping on the walls as well...

The bath tub is nice.
And i do enjoy the amenities.

reviews.author: Danyssa Padilla
reviews.text: This property is extremely unprofesional. My vehicle was towed without verification to see if it was or was not under the lease. When logging into my leasing portal it clearly stated that my vehicle was there and was a vehicle for my unit. They said that it was not under my vip parking and they don’t release the keys unless there is a vehicle signed up under that softwar. However, my keys were given to me without verification on that so this all fall backs on their lack of communication. Also, back track two months when I got the keys my unit was FILTHY with stains all over the fridge, dog hair in the unit, unmapped floors that after stepping on the floor with white socks turned my socks BLACK! I asked them to send someone to clean it the following day before I moved my furniture in when the furniture company got there on their time being paid from my own wallet the unit was not cleaned and was still in the same disgusting condition it was given to me in. As a new resident I am extremely disappointed in the customer service aspect of how things have been handled since the jump. Not to mention, they have an officer on the property who feels the need to harass residents like he’s apart of the office staff and as a woman living in her unit alone that is quite intimidating and does not make me feel comfortable here at all. He asked me my unit number on multiple occasions which does not make me feel at home one bit. This has been a whole situation. Working two jobs and being in Nursing school I barely have free time to myself and to be late to class because my vehicle was towed without actually being contacted to see if there was some type of mistake or what is super disappointing. I will not be renewing my lease here I’m thinking of terminating it. This is ridiculous.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Danyssa, we are sorry to hear that your second vehicle was towed. I do believe we did address that issue in the office. However, if you still have more questions, please feel free to contact the office.  At Parkside we strive to give all resident's the best experience, and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to make things right.

reviews.author: Briana Hayes
reviews.text: Let me just say, I loved these apartments when I first moved in. I still love it and the set up as well. The only thing that I have struggled with from the beginning is how noisy building 1 is. From the dogs, to the first neighbor above me keeping up noise.. now I have new neighbors and they are 10x worst with the noise. It’s like no one cares about the rules in place for quiet hours. Every night around the same time I’m woke up to the same stuff. I have a toddler and I’m pregnant so when I say I am sleepy, I am sleepy and I just want one peaceful night of rest. I signed a long lease as well so here I am stuck.😂 Maybe other buildings are not as bad as building one, but I wouldn’t recommend this building.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Hello Briana, we do apologize for the noise. Please contact us if the noise is continuing as we would love to stop the issue. Thank you!

reviews.author: Carla Lamkin
reviews.text: Parkside at Round Rock is a Safe, well kept, and friendly community. I thoroughly enjoy living here as I have made many moves around Texas. The staff team always support my concerns within a timely manner. I only wish the pricing was lower to help with the financial strains for everyone in our surrounding communities. Pet friendly and clean grounds, provide a welcoming environment for everyone.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Hello Carla, thank you for the wonderful review!  We appreciate having you as part of our community and look forward to continuing to assist you with your living needs.  Please let us know if you need anything!

reviews.author: Judy Alexander
reviews.text:
These apartments are beautiful with quality interiors and lush landscaping.  The amenities include a full fitness center, pool with sundeck and private yards on some homes.

Not to mention the convenience of Major Shopping, HEB & numerous eateries and coffee shops within 5-10 minutes.

The leasing, management and maintenance are top notch.  You can't go wrong making Parkside at Round Rock your home.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Dear judy, Thanks for choosing us and leaving such a great review! We are happy to read that our team has been able to provide exceptional service for you. If you ever need anything please don't hesitate to reach out to our team. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.author: Carissa Montes
reviews.text: I haven't been here for a full week just yet and I already love it so much! It's wonderful to take my dog out into an enclosed area and to also see so many stations to help me pick up after my pet. Not to mention the dedicated dog park and pet spa on-site ❤️ I'm looking forward to taking advantage of the gym here, too! Amenities aside, I also how close it is to everything my husband and I need! HEB is a 5 minute drive, along with the Premium Outlets at Round Rock for a lot of shopping and food options! We recently moved to Texas from California so all the furniture stores have been a great resource for furnishing our apartment. Honestly, we couldn't have found a better place to start this new chapter in our lives ❤️
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 4 years ago
Hi Carrisa,
Thank you for the 5-star review!  Welcome to Texas!  We are so happy to hear that you and your husband are loving your new home here at Parkside at Round Rock.  We look forward to having you as our new residents.  Please let us know if you have any questions about the area.  We'd love to help you get more acclimated.
Kind regards,
The Parkside Team

reviews.author: Leslie M
reviews.text: I was excited about moving in back in July, but, quickly things soured. The walls are very thin and you can hear everything. There are neighbors who are chronic complainers about the smallest of things no matter what time of the day or night or week or weekend it may be and nothing is done about someone who is basically an apartment bully. With that said, the management team I have no fault with however, I do have very large issues with the fact that I can hear everything because the walls are so thin. The price is not worth it if I have to hear my neighbor's  loo flush and the conversations. Good place to live but I wouldn't recommend it either.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Hi Leslie, we appreciate your honest feedback, as we are always looking for ways to improve.  Please feel free to reach out to the office at 512.388.5000 to provide more details.

reviews.author: Dee H
reviews.text:
Update: 4/2023
Where to begin....this place is a mess, from the management/staff to the billing. We just moved out and were charged $10 (for a trashbag and other fraudulent fees - and they took our deposit (that they said they did not receive)). There was absolutely nothing in the apartment so, why did you charge for a trashbag? In our previous apartment unit, they charged $300 plus for a nail in the wall and carpet cleaning - cleaning they would normally do for each unit anyway - and for carpet that did NOT contain not one blemish or stain. This place is just a money pit. They CHARGE and CHARGE...but, take a look at the hallways, how they (do not) upkeep the buildings, the crime (yes - I will say it again) that occurs on the grounds. They claim this review is fraudulent but, if you live/lived there, you know what I mean...they sit in the office, look at their computers, and rack up the payments! They could care less about residents or the issues within the community - which is evident by their (lack of) action, over-billing, and deaf ears.

Older Review:
It appears Parkside has been removing some of their reviews.
So, I will add another one. Yesterday there were at least 15 Round Rock police officers in the complex, including SWAT - in a standoff for at least 4 hours. This is not acceptable. The management (2nd set since January of this year) need to be more mindful and selective of who they allow to move in...They are so focused on having 100% occupancy that they are not paying attention to red flags. The place is a hot mess.

Looks good on the outside. On the inside the place is falling apart, literally.

Management is invisible within the community. On-site security is a joke. Some of the cameras on the property do not work. Our neighbor found this out the hard way when someone backed into her car. You get a different answer each time you enter the office - it depends on who to speak with. The staff follow-up is horrible. Trash piled up so high in the garages, it is ridiculous and the smell is horrible. The hallways contain blood, dog poop, dog hair, and other unmentionables. Maintenance shows up unannounced (even when no issue is reported).
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Dee H, While we thank you for your comment, we have checked with our local police department, the SWAT division as well as our courtesy office and cameras we have on  site and there are no records of such an event. If you have any information you can pass along to us so we can look into this further we would greatly appreciate it. Please email us at parksideroundrock@aveneue5apt.com. Thank you.

reviews.author: Isabel Oropeza
reviews.text:
I lived there in 2021-2022, my credit was brand new so they asked for a refundable one month rent deposit, we gave it to then and we never got it back. It’s 2024 now and I just get told “is not our responsibility to give back the refund” a different management was there but I just saw different buildings going through the same thing and the property gave back the refund, not the previous management company. What a hassle for my own money. This should be considered theft! I will be speaking to a lawyer soon.

They say to call but they don’t answer
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner a year ago
Hello Isabel, I am sorry you are dealing with this situation. If you would like to call the office again I will be more than happy to speak with you and get you the contacts needed.

reviews.author: Kelley Kennedy
reviews.text: We haven't been here quite a month and are in the 'older stage of our lives, this is a new experience.  To say the office staff is wonderful and patient would be an understatement,  they are so very very nice and helpful.   They are also very responsive to maintenance needs, James is great!! We are very happy, just need a poop station out back, so all the dogs owners will put the poo where it belongs-only reason no 5 stars:-)
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 5 years ago
Thank you for your review and recommendation!   We agree with your request and have put in a submission for a dog station to be placed in the area you suggested.  This should be completed this week.  Thank you for choosing Parkside, Kelley.  We will continue to help you with all of your needs!
Kind regards,
Amy

reviews.author: Maddy
reviews.text: I come here often to visit my mother and I have had enough of this apartment. It is so beautiful on the outside but disgusting on the inside, trash is left everywhere, the trash cans are always overflown, the stairs are disgusting and let’s …
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Hi Maddy, Thank you for your honest feedback. We are truly disappointed we did not meet your expectations. I can assure you the staff here care about this property very much, and while there has been some turnover earlier this year, the … More

reviews.author: Justin Hedrick
reviews.text: My wife and I toured the property.  Everything was perfect, except our budget. Very unfortunate,  we would have loved to live there, especially dealing with Bella. She sold us. Very sweet, kind, and down to earth. Hopefully next year. Thank you Bella.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Hello Justin, thank you for the kind words about our community!  Bella is an integral part of our team and we love having her here!  Our prices also can change daily, so please continue to check out our website at www.parksideroundrock.com in case our prices match your budgeted!

reviews.author: Tommy Washington
reviews.text: I want to thank Andrew, Carlos, Keith for the great job they are doing. These maintenance guys are awesome . Mainly finds the issues and get it done right and quick. One time my water heater in my apartment . The water would not get hot and right away Andrew and his crew fixed it right the first time and in no time flat.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Hello Tommy, Thanks for choosing us and leaving such a great review! We are happy to read that our team has been able to provide exceptional service for you. Please reach out to us with any additional questions or comments! See you soon!

reviews.author: Zachary Paz
reviews.text: They towed my rental car without any kind of warning. They didn’t leave a note or anything. …

reviews.author: Jeremiah Wright
reviews.text: My wife and I have been a resident here for 2 years, when I first moved in it was owned by Lincoln property company, they did a great job. Then about a year ago, the complex was bought by avenue 5 property company. The staff was replaced …
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 3 years ago
Hi Jeremiah, Thank you for your honest feedback. I want to extend my sincerest apologies concerning the trash rooms and package situation. When you have a moment please reach out to our team at parksideroundrock@avenue5apt.com so we can address your concerns. Sincerely, Parkside at Round Rock Staff.

reviews.author: aliza garcia
reviews.text: First of all, the staff is extremely friendly and helpful. However, not sure I would use luxury to describe the units. The amenities are amazing, but the units themselves were rushed. Paint chips rather easily, broken cabinet (not fixed …
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 4 years ago
Thank you for reaching out regarding these concerns, A.! Please connect with us directly at (512) 388-5000 or parksideroundrockmgr@lincolnapts.com and we'd be glad to review these maintenance needs. Our residents' comfort is a great priority for us, so we hope to speak with you soon about improving your stay here. Thank you!

reviews.author: J
reviews.text: Moving in was a breeze thanks to the high performing team the Parkside at Round Rock has to offer. Alyssa was able to get me my mailbox key in no time. If you’re thinking this may be the next place for you then you wouldn’t be wrong.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Jake Pardo - thanks for your lovely comments about our team. We'll be sure to let them know they went Beyond Expectations! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

reviews.author: Dede Bonelli
reviews.text: This is a great place to live! Alyssa was so helpful and kind through the whole process. It was the best experience I've ever had renting an apartment (mostly due to her guidance and help.)
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Dede Bonelli, your review about Parkside at Round Rock made our day! Thanks so much for taking the time to write. We're so happy your experience went Beyond Expectations. Let us know if there's anything else we can do!

reviews.author: Ashley Adeyemi
reviews.text: Wish I could leave 0!!! This place is TERRIBLE. It’s overpriced and the management is absolute trash! As the other reviews stated NO ONE answers the phone or emails. I’ve emailed for a week straight & still haven’t heard anything. I call it …

reviews.author: Hailey Wireman
reviews.text: We had the most helpful and knowledgeable leasing agent. BELLA WAS AMAZING! She listened to our needs and was able to help us find the perfect apartment. This apartment complex is a dream come true.
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this great feedback!  Bella is great and we are happy that she was able to take care of your needs!  Welcome to Parkside at Round Rock!!

reviews.author: Louis Brown
reviews.text: Apartment and Amenities are nice. The disappointing thing is upon move in apartment was not as expected. Dry wall dust in showers, floor scratches from washer and dryer install, paint on the patio etc. Definitely a rush job. Everything for …
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 5 years ago
Dear Louis,
Thank you for your review and we value all feedback! We are so glad to hear you enjoy the amenities and your apartment home! We appreciate you taking the time … More

reviews.author: Tommy Adair
reviews.text: I have lived at Parkside Round Rock since September of 2020 and I really hope I never have to leave. It’s close to my work and there are multiple places to get groceries and dine out, so it’s a very convenient location. The staff is always …
reviews.response_text:
Response from the owner 2 years ago
Thank you so much for leaving this amazing review! We are so happy to hear that you are loving Parkside! We look forward to seeing you soon!

reviews.author: Tyler Wills
reviews.text: Got home from an out of state trip to find my apartment a mess due to a leak that happened, where the only notification I was given was a call TWO days ago saying they “may” have to enter my apartment. Since then, I have not received any …
reviews.response_text:
