reviews.author: Anna Hill
reviews.text:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
I’ve had a great experience at Broadleaf Apartment Homes! The community is well-maintained, clean, and feels very welcoming. The staff is professional, responsive, and truly cares about residents. I especially want to give a huge shout-out to Alexis she is absolutely amazing! Alexis was knowledgeable, friendly, and went above and beyond to make the entire process smooth and stress-free. Her positive attitude and willingness to help really stood out. I highly recommend Broadleaf Apartment Homes to anyone looking for a great place to live!

reviews.author: Marvie-Lynn Manuel
reviews.text: Moved in after two days of viewing the place! Sole was great at making me feel welcomed and the process was easy peasy! A lot of great amenities! Tidy and clean!

reviews.author: De'Janae' Guillory-Williams
reviews.text: I had a great tour of this apartment complex with Alexis, who was friendly, knowledgeable, and very helpful throughout the entire process. The community is well maintained and located in a very convenient area, especially being close to where I work. The apartments are spacious and modern, and the amenities are amazing. The rooftop pool was definitely a highlight and really sets this place apart. If my lease was up or I didn’t already have a place to live, I would absolutely choose to live here.

reviews.author: Leo Yang
reviews.text: Overall, my experience has been excellent. The leasing office staff are very warm, friendly, and helpful. The apartment amenities and the overall environment are both very satisfying. All of these factors are what ultimately made me choose to live here.

reviews.author: Michael Boncelet
reviews.text: I recently toured an apartment with Sole, and it was an outstanding experience from start to finish. She was incredibly knowledgeable about the property, pointing out all the key features like the spacious layout, appliances, and natural lighting without any pushy sales tactics. She answered every question I had with clear, honest insights and helped me visualize living there. The tour was efficient yet thorough, and her friendly, professional demeanor made the whole process enjoyable. If you're apartment hunting, I highly recommend reaching out to Sole—she's top-notch!

reviews.author: Ryan Wetmore
reviews.text: Moved into Curate recently and have had a great experience so far! Serena in the leasing office assisted me with my tour, choosing a unit (I also switched units and she was very helpful), and with all of my paperwork and was awesome to work with. Chloe assisted with my official move-in and was also very great to work with. The unit is very well designed and the facilities are well maintained and convenient. Complex is in a great location and parking is easy. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Terry Steiner
reviews.text: We recently moved our daughter into Curate and the place is beautiful!  We love that she is in a secure building and safe area!  The entire grounds are clean and they take great pride in their property!  We worked with Serena in the leasing office and she went out of her way to do a FaceTime call with me to show us the property! The leasing staff has been so helpful and amazing!  I would highly recommend this property!!!!

reviews.author: Guesthouse Coffee Bar
reviews.text: We absolutely love working with Chloe and Izabella!  The Curate residents are so warm and welcoming to us as vendors and you can’t ask for better community spaces. Plus, the location is first class with everything you would possibly need within a few minutes walk/drive.  Would highly recommend for vendors and residents.

reviews.author: Brandon Johnson
reviews.text:
Great location and incredible staff!

The staff at Curate really do care about your living experience and are always putting on events- hosting food trucks, yoga and massages. Great modern apartments in a shopping area location with a lot of grassy areas for dog owners.

The pool, gym, hot tub and work offices are wonderful amenities!

Favorite Features: Walk-in shower and the sky lounge!

reviews.author: Brittany Deminck
reviews.text: I really enjoy living here. It’s quiet, clean and the staff are super friendly. Maintenance is quick and friendly. They have fun events every month and great amenities.

reviews.text: No assistance and rude desk staff

The Confluence

reviews.author: Lauren Dymek
reviews.text:
My boyfriend and I have lived here a little over a year now and could not be happier! The employees are so friendly, there’s always fun community events, and the units alone are stunning. Mario brightens our day every time we see him!

When it came time for our renewal, the leasing team (shout out Cain!) really went above and beyond and it further solidified our decision to stay here for a long time.

Highly recommend leasing here!
reviews.response_text: We are pleased to hear you're so happy here! Thank you for the kind words about Mario and Cain.

reviews.text: Incredible staff, amenities, and apartments. Always fun community events to attend!

I’m relocating to Denver from the East Coast and recently toured several properties. The Confluence truly stood out, thanks to Abby. She was incredibly warm, professional, and knowledgeable—making me feel instantly welcomed.

Abby gave a thorough tour of the property and answered all my questions with ease. She also shared great insights about the resident community and Denver’s local scene—from restaurants and nightlife to music venues and theater. Her enthusiasm and elegance made the experience memorable.

I genuinely appreciated the time and attention she gave. If you're considering the Confluence, I highly recommend connecting with Abby!

reviews.text: We've had the absolute pleasure of partnering with The Confluence to provide private chef experiences for their residents, and we can't say enough great things. reviews.text:
I’ve had the chance to come to the Confluence many times as a vendor, and every visit leaves me smiling. I just love the building, the residents, and the management! The location couldn’t be better, with amazing views and so close to the river, which makes it perfect for a walk.

What always stands out to me is how Abigail and the rest of the management team create such a warm, welcoming environment. You can really feel the sense of community, and it’s clear that neighbors here genuinely enjoy each other’s company.

And the dogs… they’re the sweetest! ❤️Every time I’m there, I see pups happily greeting each other, and their owners chatting and laughing together.

If you are looking to relocate in Denver and are searching for a well-located residence with great amenities and friendly neighbors, I would really consider the Confluence!
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for your kind feedback, Emma! We’ve truly enjoyed having you contribute to our community. Our goal is always to create a warm, welcoming, and friendly environment, and we’re so glad to hear that it’s shining through. And yes—we love our resident dogs just as much as our residents!

Thank you,
The Confluence

reviews.author: Ryan & Tanya Forman
reviews.text:
Our family has had the most incredible experience at Sloane West Tower, and we truly cannot say enough wonderful things about the concierge, leasing, and building support teams. From day one, they (Ruby, Mariam, Claire, Priya, Lindsey….the list goes on and on), welcomed us with open arms and made our move so much easier and completely stress-free. Every question was answered with patience, every request handled quickly, and every interaction filled with warmth and professionalism.
They have gone above and beyond—not just for us, but for our dog, Chewy, too! It’s rare to find a place that makes your pet feel just as welcome as the rest of the family, and the team here genuinely cares. Chewy gets just as much love and attention as we do, which speaks volumes about the kind of community they foster.
The amenities and activities are absolutely top-notch. There’s always something thoughtfully planned for residents, and the team truly can never do enough for us. Their dedication, kindness, and attention to detail make Sloane West Tower feel more like a community than just a building. We are so grateful to call this place home and highly recommend it to anyone looking for exceptional service and an outstanding living experience.
reviews.response_text:
Hi Ryan and Tanya,

Thank you so much for this incredibly thoughtful review.

We’re so happy to hear that your experience at Sloane West Tower has been such a positive one. It means a great deal to know that our concierge, leasing, and support teams—Ruby, Mariam, Claire, Priya, Lindsey, and everyone involved—helped make your move smooth and stress-free. Providing responsive, professional, and genuinely caring service is always our goal.

We especially love hearing that Chewy feels at home too! Creating a welcoming environment for every member of the family, pets included, is something we truly value.

Your kind words about our amenities, resident events, and community atmosphere mean so much to us. Thank you for your recommendation, we’re grateful to have you as part our Sloane community.

Sloane Team

Sloane Team

reviews.author: Faith Apolskis
reviews.text:
Moved into my unit in October '25 and I have nothing but wonderful things to say about my entire experience so far!

During my initial tour, Patrick was just wonderful to work with! He answered all my questions and helped me apply on the spot. Before move-in, Patrick, Micaela, and Joshua in the front office allowed me to move my move-in date with no issues and rushed to clean my unit after the old tenant moved out so it was in great shape for me to move-in. It was such a great experience i even extended my lease before move-in day! The garage is gated and i've yet to see the gate break down (my old complex had gate issues every other day), there's plenty of parking, and I've seen private security walking the garage overnight!

Since I've moved in, i've had a couple maintenance "issues" (regular apartment stuff) that the maintenance team has gone ABOVE & BEYOND for! My requests are reviewed same-day and either resolved or addressed by the next day. Amir is responsive, knowledgeable, and exactly who you want to help you with any surprise maintenance needs! Just, the best!

The *only* thing I'll say to be aware of is if you're living on the east side or close to downtown, you have to be prepared for some acts of vandalism (as you do in most cities). There's only been one instance of vandalism in our garage since my move-in but even then, the front office team handled it wonderfully! They sent out an email alerting tenants, immediately hired daytime security, and even helped my friend check on my car as I was out of town when this occurred.

A long review to say, i would definitely recommend living here or anywhere this team manages! Thank you!

reviews.author: Fabian Fernandez
reviews.text:
I’ve lived at 7East for 7 years and continue to be impressed with the way this community takes care of its residents. Recently, my entire sink collapsed unexpectedly, and the maintenance team handled the situation with urgency and professionalism. Amir came by the very next day to assess the issue and immediately coordinated a contractor to get everything repaired.

Not only did they install a brand-new sink, but they also replaced the entire floor in the area which had a bit of water damage, and the work was done quickly and with great attention to detail. Throughout the whole process, Amir checked in, communicated clearly, and made sure everything was resolved to a high standard.

The level of service here has always been consistent, and this experience is just another example of why I’ve chosen to stay at 7East for so long. Big shoutout to Amir for going above and beyond. His professionalism, kindness, and follow-through truly make a difference. Highly recommend living here!

reviews.author: Baylee Sivils
reviews.text: Moved in recently and have had such a positive experience so far.  Patrick made my leasing/move-in process so seamless and has been extremely kind! I had a few maintenance issues upon move-in that Amir addressed swiftly- he’s super knowledgeable and eager to help!

reviews.author: Luke Page
reviews.text:
I really enjoyed living at 7East. Great location, solid unit quality, and a very fair price. I would have stayed longer if a larger unit had been available to transfer into.

The standout here is the staff. I’ve lived in plenty of apartments, and this team is among the best I’ve encountered—professional, responsive, and kind. Micaela sold me on the community during my initial tours and remained personable and supportive after move‑in; the rest of the team was consistently great too. The property itself isn’t flashy, and yes, things occasionally break, but the staff’s attitude and follow‑through made me feel issues were handled as well as possible.

Overall: Strong value, excellent service, and a smooth living experience.

reviews.author: Luke C
reviews.text: The maintenance team has been excellent, always prompt, professional, and efficient with service requests. Issues are addressed quickly and thoroughly, and communication is clear throughout the process. It makes a noticeable difference knowing requests are handled reliably and with care.

reviews.author: Rabia Abbasi
reviews.text: Brian helped me move and I will say he is amazing! Sorted out all my concerns and allotted me my dream space!

reviews.author: Willie Rojas
reviews.text:
I’ve been going on living here for three years and the new management is no help or unresponsive.  Also when you need maintenance done, they do not replace or fix things with what you had before.  We are supposed to have smart switches but mine went out and they replaced it with a regular switch.  This can be a small issue but when you are charge an internet/smart package it becomes an issue.  You are paying for a service that as time goes buy you are not able to use anymore.  Why have an app when you cannot manage your lights.  Only thing it’s good for is to open your door without having to use your key.
I will be looking for a new place to live.  I love my apt but with this new management it has made it hard to live here.

reviews.author: Kritika Taparia
reviews.text: Clean and well-maintained apartment in a prime location. The facilities are great and everything is easily accessible nearby. Overall, a very comfortable place to live—highly recommend!

reviews.author: Everett Freeman
reviews.text: I live here. The spot is ok i guess but whenever I need handyman help the service is amazing. Brando just fixed my light and he’s so friendly and very quick and professional!
reviews.response_text: Everett, thanks for saying so!

reviews.author: Lindsey Webb
reviews.text: We have enjoyed living here at Block 44! Shout out to our awesome maintenance guy, Brando, is the nicest and is so quick to come and help with any problems we have had!
reviews.response_text: Lindsey, I'm glad that you're enjoying living here. Brando and the rest of the team are happy to have you!

reviews.author: Sammy's Heating & Air
reviews.text: Great apartment community and Amanda and Brando are always so on top of things!

reviews.author: Matthew Nelson
reviews.text: We stayed at an Airbnb unit and the hosts and accommodations were amazing.  The views from the apartment and balcony were perfect. 5 stars for the unit and our stay in the unit.  But,  the smell in the hallways and common areas were unbearable!  I had to hold my breath when walking through.  No air circulation …only spraying a horrible masking overcoat of stank.  The hallways were dirty and trash was allowed to be in the hallway at anytime (gross).  Litter in the garage was there for 4 days untouched…it is probably still there.  This place needs to step it up.  I know college kids probably live here and don’t care but the smell in the common areas (halls, workout room, shared tv meeting rooms) is HORRIBLE!

reviews.author: Kathleen Donnelly
reviews.text: This place is amazing I love it!!!

reviews.author: Stephanie
reviews.text: Sunny is absolutely wonderful! She is always so kind, attentive, and helpful every time I stop by. She truly goes above and beyond to make residents feel welcome and taken care of. Block 44 is lucky to have her!
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for your kind words about Sunny! We’re delighted to hear how much you appreciate her kindness and attentiveness. She truly cares about creating a welcoming environment for our residents, and your feedback means a lot. We’re lucky to have her on our team, and even luckier to have residents like you who make our community so special!

reviews.author: Matt Castleberry
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We’re so glad to know you’re enjoying your experience with us.

reviews.author: Julian Hodge
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We’re so glad to know you’re enjoying your experience with us.

reviews.author: Oc Psy
reviews.text:
I’ve had a great experience with Block 44 Apartments. The property is well-maintained, modern, and has excellent amenities like the gym, pool, and parking garage that make living here super convenient. The location is also great, close to downtown and everything you need.

The management team is professional, responsive, and truly cares about residents. Anytime I’ve had a question or needed help, they’ve handled it quickly and with a great attitude. You can tell they put effort into keeping the community safe and welcoming.

Overall, Block 44 has been an amazing place to live and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable, upscale apartment in Salt Lake City.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re thrilled to hear that you’ve had such a positive experience at Block 44. Our team takes pride in maintaining a modern community with amenities that make life convenient and enjoyable, so it’s great to know you’re loving the gym, pool, and parking garage.

We’re especially glad that our management team has been able to support you with quick, friendly service—we truly value our residents and want everyone to feel at home here. Thank you for recommending Block 44, and for being a part of our community!

reviews.author: Xuanyi .Z
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the 5 star review!! We appreciate you as our valued resident!

reviews.author: Jim C
reviews.text:
Stayed 9 nights through Marriott Vacations — unfortunately, I wouldn’t return.
The property fell short in several key areas. The walls are extremely thin — I could hear footsteps from the room above throughout the day and night, and every night around midnight, someone in the hallway had loud phone conversations that continued despite me asking them to lower their voice.

Road noise is constant, and the view from my room was of a vacant parking lot that felt unsafe, with visible signs of homelessness and people sleeping on the pavement. The adjacent 7-Eleven has a flashing blue security light and a voice-activated “no loitering” announcement that goes off frequently, adding to the discomfort.

The room itself was passable but felt cheaply furnished. I had looked forward to relaxing by the pool, but the hot tub jets didn’t work, the furniture was dirty and neglected, and the main pool had visible dirt at the bottom — clearly not maintained regularly.

I’ve included photos to show the reality, which is far from what the listing portrayed. I travel to Salt Lake City often for work and had hoped this could be a go-to spot for future stays, but based on this experience, I won’t be returning.

reviews.author: Josh Rios
reviews.text: I toured here on Thursday! I’m honestly impressed with the amount of amenities they have! The office staff was very friendly and eager to help. Their model unit felt so comfy. Definitely one of my top places on the list!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for touring with us and for the amazing feedback! We're so glad you enjoyed the amenities and felt comfortable in the model unit—that’s exactly the experience we hope to create. Our team takes pride in being welcoming and helpful, and we’re excited to hear we made a great impression. Let us know if you have any follow-up questions—we’d love to welcome you to the community!

reviews.author: Mason Farris
reviews.text: I lived at Block 44 in 2024 and was very pleased with the location and quality of my apartment. It's walking distance to many of my favorite downtown spots and so much great food! I only moved out because I had to leave the state for a new job. I would always consider moving back into these apartments.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience! We’re glad to hear you enjoyed your time at Block 44 and that the location and apartment quality made a great impression. It’s always tough to say goodbye to residents like you, but we wish you all the best in your new role and hope to welcome you back if you ever return to the area. You’ll always have a home here at Block 44!

reviews.author: Yong Wang
reviews.text: My son lived in Block 44 for 6 months and moved out in March 2025. Till today (5/1/2025), we have not received our security deposit yet. I kept calling them and was told that they changed management company and I need to call GreyStar directly. I was given a phone number and till today nobody answered or returned phone calls .  At this moment, I have no idea how to get my security deposit back. This is the first time, I have experience this . Question: am I the only one having this experience with Block 44?

reviews.author: Evan Reed
reviews.text: Stayed here in an Airbnb. Area is in a great location with an easy commute to downtown. we hardly had to use our vehicle, and we could just walk or use the Lime scooters.

reviews.author: Blaze Bullock
reviews.text:
Update: I reached out to the community manager after they responded to my review saying to do so, they never responded. So bad.

Management is absolutely terrible here. Do not move here.
reviews.response_text: Blaze Bullock - I'm disappointed to hear you had a negative experience at our community. If there's anything else you'd like to share, please don't hesitate to contact us directly. Thank you for letting us know about this. We'll use your comments to improve how we work, so we can ensure this doesn't happen again at Block 44.

reviews.author: Blaze Bullock
reviews.text:
Update: after they responded to my review and said to contact them, I reached out per their instructions and they NEVER RESPONDED TO ME. What a joke.

Don't move here. They told me I could park in a specific spot in while I was moving in and then they towed my truck while I was moving in with Sammy stuff in it and refused to pay for it. Worst moving experience I've ever had. The management are terrible and take no responsibility. Cindy in particular was the worst. She showed zero empathy.
reviews.response_text: At Block 44, we strive for 100% satisfaction - I'm so sorry to hear your experience didn't meet that standard. Our community manager would really like to speak with you about this. Please contact us at block44mgr@greystar.com as soon as you've got a moment. We look forward to hearing from you.

reviews.author: Mykola Shpin
reviews.text: This is what the new company Kairoi …left behind after a few hours of its stay at the Club house…

reviews.author: Amy M
reviews.response_text: So good to hear from you! Thanks for letting us know. Have a great day! Thanks again for taking some time to about your visit to Block 44. Be well!

reviews.author: juan diego puentes agudelo
reviews.response_text: Aw, Juan Diego Puentes Agudelo! Your amazing feedback and rating mean the world to us. Thank you again for the great review! We really appreciate you.

reviews.author: Chase little
reviews.text: Cindy and Mariana have been absolutely amazing helping me and Best of Utah moving foster a great relationship to make sure everyone’s moving needs are met coming to and from block44, thank you so much for being so helpful!
reviews.response_text: Chase Little - thanks for your lovely comments about our team. We'll be sure to let them know they went Beyond Expectations! It's our pleasure to assist! Let us know if anything else comes up, and take care.

reviews.author: Daniel Alves Contrucci
reviews.response_text: So good to hear from you! Thanks for letting us know. Have a great day! Thank again for the awesome feedback! Hope you have a great day.

reviews.author: Aubree Blanchard
reviews.text: Easily the best apartment I’ve ever lived in. I’ve been here a year now and never had an issue with management (in fact they are so helpful and kind!) and the apartment itself is in a perfect location and has great, clean amenities. I would buy this place if I could ✨
reviews.response_text: Aubree Blanchard, your review about Block 44 made our day! Thanks so much for taking the time to write. Thanks again for taking some time to about your visit to Block 44. Be well!

reviews.author: Lizzie Perez
reviews.text: This place has a lot of Airbnb apartments for rent and it's not safe. I tried renting one and the customer service was horrible. A lot of homeless in the area and management doesn't seem to care at all to fix anything.
reviews.response_text: Hi Lizzie, we are sorry to hear that your experience was not excellent. Please reach out to the approved corporate lease holder for further assistance. You are also welcome to reach out to us anytime for questions.

reviews.author: Jonathan Insignares
reviews.response_text: Hi Jonathan, thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with us here at Block 44. The team and I love to see such great feedback! All the best to you!

reviews.author: Teilana Togiai
reviews.response_text:
Hi Teilana, 

At Block 44, we pride ourselves on providing an exemplary experience, so we're deeply disappointed to see that your experience did not reflect that. We hope you'll reach out to us at (801) 456-1404 so we may discuss details. We hope to hear from you soon.

reviews.author: Luke Sommer
reviews.text: Judgmental, unwelcoming, creepy community. Had other residents taking pictures of us in the hot tub, people making rude faces whilst we enjoyed the club house. Just not cool.
reviews.response_text: Hi Luke, we are sorry to hear your experience at Block 44 was less than excellent. Please feel free to contact us at 801-456-1404. We'd love to discuss how we can make things right. We hope you have a better day!

reviews.author: Isaac Romero
reviews.text: I really enjoyed living here; this has been one of the best apartments I’ve lived in. Even though this place is in downtown, it’s pretty quiet most of the time. I had never had any issues. Maintenance requests are attended to quickly, and Gabriel and his team are really friendly and helpful. I really loved living here; it is so close to everything. I got to live in a 1-bedroom and in a studio.
reviews.response_text: Hi Isaac, thank you for your 5-star review! We surely miss having you as a part of our community. We hope you are having a great start to 2025!

reviews.author: Adriana Vargas
reviews.text: Block44 has been a dream for me as a remote worker! The complex has a quiet, relaxed environment with coworking spaces and reliable internet, so working from home has been a breeze. I love being able to take breaks by the pool or in the gym without ever having to leave the building. The apartments are well soundproofed, so it’s easy to focus and get work done without distractions. The management team is friendly and responsive, making the whole experience stress-free. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a home that supports both work and relaxation!
reviews.response_text: Adriana Vargas, we are so pleased you're enjoying your experience at Block 44!

reviews.author: ACC2
reviews.text: I’ve absolutely loved living at Block44! The apartments are spacious with large windows, so there’s plenty of natural light, making it feel warm and inviting. The staff is also amazing and always ready to help. If you’re looking for a peaceful, nature-friendly community to call home, I’d highly recommend it!
reviews.response_text: Acc2, we are so happy to read such a great review about Block 44!

reviews.author: A V
reviews.text: I've really enjoyed my time living at Block44. The apartments are spacious, well-designed, and have a cozy, modern feel. Maintenance requests are handled quickly, which makes a big difference, and the management team is super attentive and helpful. I love the community vibe here—neighbors are friendly, and there’s a sense of community that’s rare to find. The complex is also quiet and peaceful, which makes it a great place to unwind after a busy day. Overall, a great place to live!
reviews.response_text: A V, your satisfaction is our top priority. Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your time at Block 44. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

reviews.author: WalterRRS
reviews.text: I’ve had an amazing experience living at Block44! The property is well-maintained, and the amenities are fantastic – from the modern gym to the relaxing pool area, there’s everything you need. The staff is incredibly friendly and responsive; they truly go above and beyond to ensure residents are comfortable. The location is convenient with easy access to shops, restaurants, and public transport. Plus, the community feels safe and welcoming, which is a huge bonus. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a great place to call home!
reviews.response_text: Walterrrs - thanks for your lovely comments about our team. We'll be sure to let them know they went Beyond Expectations!

reviews.author: Sebastian Hermosilla
reviews.text: Living at Block44 has exceeded my expectations in every way! The units are beautifully designed and feel incredibly comfortable, making it easy to settle in and feel at home right away. The community amenities are top-notch, with everything from a state-of-the-art fitness center to cozy common areas where residents can relax or work. What really stands out is the welcoming atmosphere; both the staff and neighbors are friendly, making it feel like a true community. The management team is proactive and always ready to help, which has made my experience here stress-free. Highly recommend to anyone seeking a well-rounded and supportive community to call home!
reviews.response_text: Sebastian Hermosilla, your review about Block 44 made our day! Thanks so much for taking the time to write.

reviews.author: Steven Mccombs
reviews.text: Block44 is truly a gem! From the moment I moved in, I’ve been impressed by the luxury and attention to detail throughout the complex. The apartments are stunning, with high-quality finishes, spacious layouts, and plenty of natural light. The amenities are incredible – the pool feels like a resort, the gym is fully equipped, and there are even great spaces for gatherings and events. The staff is always friendly and goes above and beyond to ensure residents have everything they need. It’s been a wonderful experience living here, and I’d highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-end, hassle-free living experience!
reviews.response_text: Steven Mccombs, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations! We appreciate you and thank you for taking the time to give us a great review.

reviews.author: Rabia Abbasi
reviews.text: Brian helped me move and I will say he is amazing! Sorted out all my concerns and allotted me my dream space!

reviews.author: Willie Rojas
reviews.text:
I’ve been going on living here for three years and the new management is no help or unresponsive.  Also when you need maintenance done, they do not replace or fix things with what you had before.  We are supposed to have smart switches but mine went out and they replaced it with a regular switch.  This can be a small issue but when you are charge an internet/smart package it becomes an issue.  You are paying for a service that as time goes buy you are not able to use anymore.  Why have an app when you cannot manage your lights.  Only thing it’s good for is to open your door without having to use your key.
I will be looking for a new place to live.  I love my apt but with this new management it has made it hard to live here.

reviews.author: Kritika Taparia
reviews.text: Clean and well-maintained apartment in a prime location. The facilities are great and everything is easily accessible nearby. Overall, a very comfortable place to live—highly recommend!

reviews.author: Everett Freeman
reviews.text: I live here. The spot is ok i guess but whenever I need handyman help the service is amazing. Brando just fixed my light and he’s so friendly and very quick and professional!
reviews.response_text: Everett, thanks for saying so!

reviews.author: Lindsey Webb
reviews.text: We have enjoyed living here at Block 44! Shout out to our awesome maintenance guy, Brando, is the nicest and is so quick to come and help with any problems we have had!
reviews.response_text: Lindsey, I'm glad that you're enjoying living here. Brando and the rest of the team are happy to have you!

reviews.author: Sammy's Heating & Air
reviews.text: Great apartment community and Amanda and Brando are always so on top of things!

reviews.author: Matthew Nelson
reviews.text: We stayed at an Airbnb unit and the hosts and accommodations were amazing.  The views from the apartment and balcony were perfect. 5 stars for the unit and our stay in the unit.  But,  the smell in the hallways and common areas were unbearable!  I had to hold my breath when walking through.  No air circulation …only spraying a horrible masking overcoat of stank.  The hallways were dirty and trash was allowed to be in the hallway at anytime (gross).  Litter in the garage was there for 4 days untouched…it is probably still there.  This place needs to step it up.  I know college kids probably live here and don’t care but the smell in the common areas (halls, workout room, shared tv meeting rooms) is HORRIBLE!

reviews.author: Kathleen Donnelly
reviews.text: This place is amazing I love it!!!

reviews.author: Stephanie
reviews.text: Sunny is absolutely wonderful! She is always so kind, attentive, and helpful every time I stop by. She truly goes above and beyond to make residents feel welcome and taken care of. Block 44 is lucky to have her!
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for your kind words about Sunny! We’re delighted to hear how much you appreciate her kindness and attentiveness. She truly cares about creating a welcoming environment for our residents, and your feedback means a lot. We’re lucky to have her on our team, and even luckier to have residents like you who make our community so special!

reviews.author: Heather McKinney
reviews.text: Easy move in, clean amenities and unit. Neighbors I’ve met so far have been nice!

reviews.author: Delee
reviews.text: One of my clients lives at this property. I walk her dogs while she is out of town. I just wanted to say that the people who work here are so kind. Jennice the property manager always offers me coffee or water. Everyone always greets me with smiling faces.

reviews.author: T. Wade
reviews.text: I toured this property, and everything from the start was professional and very well put together! The property manager and staff are all super friendly and easy to work with! This is definitely my top pick!

reviews.author: Serigne M Diop
reviews.text:
I had an outstanding experience working with Tommy at Aspire 7th & Grant during my recent apartment search and move-in process. From my initial inquiry to the day I picked up my keys, Tommy was incredibly professional, responsive, and genuinely helpful.
He took the time to understand my specific needs and budget, and his knowledge of living conditions helped me get the perfect place much faster than I expected. When a small issue arose with the lease paperwork, Tommy handled it immediately and kept me informed throughout the resolution, which minimized my stress. His dedication to ensuring I was satisfied every step of the way truly set him apart.
I highly recommend Tommy to anyone looking for a seamless and positive rental experience!

reviews.author: Austin Orr
reviews.text: Had to make a delivery and dropped a ton of boxes. One of the maintenance techs noticed and helped me out, think his name was Forrest? Good guy, very clean property.

reviews.author: Alyze Cornuaud
reviews.text: Everyone at aspire is very nice! Great management and Forrest from maintenance is very fast and friendly!

reviews.author: Madison Hakey
reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful property! The property is well maintained and located in the perfect spot of Denver. The pool is gorgeous, property is quiet, and management is very kind and helpful. Shout out to the maintenance team; they are super cute and very helpful! Forrest is the best!
reviews.response_text:
We greatly appreciate your positive feedback on our property and our team members. Thank you for recognizing our efforts to maintain a beautiful and quiet environment for our residents.



Jennice Minero 
Community Director

reviews.author: Erin
reviews.text: The whole Aspire team has been a pleasure to work with. The property is beautiful and close to all kinds of shops and restaurants. Maintenance is so responsive and willing to help. Austin has always been so helpful and kind.
reviews.response_text:
We are absolutely thrilled to hear about your positive experience with Aspire 7th & Grant. Thank you for your kind words, Erin!


Jennice Minero 
Community Director
