reviews.author: Reg Chambo
reviews.text: Took a tour of the property and everything is amazing. Nice size, great amenities, I love the convenience of the location. Jennice was super knowledgeable and helpful. Definitely will be circling back!
reviews.response_text:
Your positive experience means everything! I am thrilled you loved the amenities and location. Thank you, Reg, for your kind words. We would love to make Aspire your new home! 


Jennice Minero 
Community Director

reviews.author: Eric Person
reviews.text: My move in was great thanks to Tommy and Jennice. They have apartment living dialed here at the Aspire 7th and Grant. Highly recommended!
reviews.response_text:
We are grateful for your kind words Eric! I am so happy to hear your move-in experience was great! Thank you for being a part of our community! 



Jennice Minero 
Community Director

reviews.author: Lindy Eddinge
reviews.text:
Just moved in from out of state and so far very happy with my decision to live here.  Tommy and Jennice have been wonderful.  I’ve had lots of questions and they have been super helpful with my transition to Denver.
Lindy Suarez
reviews.response_text:
We are thrilled to hear you're happy with your decision Lindy! We are so excited to have you and those cute little fur friends a part of the Aspire community! 



Jennice Minero 
Community Director

reviews.author: Johnny Watson
reviews.text: Love living here. Amazing team. Austin is the goat and always makes sure small fixes needed in our apartment are done timely and is super easy to connect with. Neighbours are great. Really feels like community here.
reviews.response_text:
Hello Johnny, Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback! So glad Austin and our team create a true community feel for you.


Jennice Minero 
Community Director

reviews.author: Adrian Soria
reviews.response_text:
Hello Adrian,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We’re sorry to hear that your experience has not met expectations. Our goal is always to provide the best possible service and living experience for our future residents and current residents, and we truly value your input.

If you’re open to it, we’d love the opportunity to learn more about your concerns and see how we can make things right. Please feel free to reach out to me directly at 720-372-0899 or stop by the office at your convenience.

Best, 
Jennice Minero 
Community Director

reviews.author: Jordan Pfingsten
reviews.text:
When I first moved to Denver Aspire 7th and Grant was where I chose to start my new life in Colorado. To say that Tommy and Jennice were beyond helpful and accommodating would be an understatement. From move in to move out it was a breeze, the staff were always friendly and the amenities were in top shape.

I really appreciated Jennice's assistance with my move out - helping me go back and forth around different financial options as well as month to month pricing breakdowns.

If I was still a renter, I would be at Aspire 7th and Grant.
reviews.response_text:
Jordan, it was such a pleasure meeting you. Thank you for the warm welcome when I arrived at Aspire. I wish you all the best! 

Jennice Minero 
Community Director

reviews.author: Leo Oram
reviews.response_text: We are elated to see your 5-star rating! Your positive experience means everything to us at Aspire 7th & Grant.

reviews.author: Dylan Heraghty
reviews.text: I had an amazing experience at Aspire 7th & Grant! From the moment I walked in, Tommy made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. Even though I didn’t have an appointment, he welcomed us warmly and took the time to give us a thorough tour of the building. Tommy was incredibly friendly and knowledgeable, answering all our questions and helping us pick the perfect apartment that fit our needs and preferences. The tour was detailed and really showcased all the amenities and features that make Aspire 7th & Grant stand out. We were so impressed with both the service and the building that we decided to sign that very day! If you’re looking for a new place to live, I highly recommend Aspire 7th & Grant. Definitely ask for Tommy!
reviews.response_text:
Hello Dylan,

Thank you so much for taking the time to tour Aspire! We’re thrilled to hear that you had an amazing experience with Tommy. He truly is an extraordinary member of our team. His knowledge, professionalism, and dedication make him an incredible asset, and we’re so glad he was able to show you around.

If you have any questions or need additional information as you consider your next home, please don’t hesitate to reach out. We’d love to welcome you to the Aspire community!

Warm regards,
Jennice Minero 
Community Director

reviews.author: Ken Levy
reviews.response_text: We deeply respect your feedback. Thank you for choosing Aspire 7th & Grant.

reviews.author: Henry Gladney
reviews.text:
Great first few days at Aspire already. Have to mention how great their team is here from the front office and maintenance team. Specific shout out to Tim and Brian for fixing our locks, tweaking a few things in a timely manner to make our stay here perfect.

Chloe and Tommy are the absolute best!!

Thanks!
reviews.response_text: Thanks Henry! It's always great to know our residents are getting the best service. Our team is proud to be here to make your day better. Please let us know if you ever need anything, and we hope you are settling into your new home nicely!

reviews.author: Josh Salazar
reviews.text: Brian and his team at Aspire are great! They are easy to work with and the communication is solid! The property is always well maintained. We truly appreciate and value Brians Professionalism. We appreciate the team at Aspire.
reviews.response_text: Josh, We are glad to hear about your positive experience with Brian and our team. Thank you for sharing your feedback!

reviews.author: Kyla Holimon
reviews.text: Absolutely love Aspire! The staff, Tommy and Chloe are so wonderful and helpful. The location cannot be beat. All the conveniences of Capitol Hill in a beautiful new building. The views are amazing and so are the apartments themselves. Could not recommend this place more!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your note Kyla! We are proud to keep earning the five stars - so let us know if there's every anything else we can help with!

reviews.author: Angelina Herrera
reviews.text: Such a beautiful community! I love it here! Ask for Tommy if you are in need of assistance. He is always so helpful!
reviews.response_text: We love it here, too! Thanks for the shout out to Tommy. We're so glad to hear that he was able to help make your day a little easier.

reviews.author: Samantha Sincox
reviews.text: 10/10 Loved living here -- the apartments are super nice and in a great location. :) you legit are walking distance to a ton of cute eateries / trader joes is in your backyard. Also maintenance & the community directors/leasing team (shoutout to Chloe and Tommy) are all super awesome. Very hands on and helpful anytime you have any questions or issues. They have the most efficient response time. I appreciated how private my time was living here while still having a direct connection to community. The complex has all sorts of cute events and the amenities are the best. Lots of great mems
reviews.response_text: Thanks Samantha! Our team is happy to have made your time here so exceptional. We love creating moments of community connection for our residents. We'll miss you, but are excited for your next adventure. If you ever find yourself back in CapHill look us up!

reviews.author: Beverly Chapa
reviews.text: I just wanted to take a moment to recognize a great employee at Aspire. The supervisor, Brian, works tirelessly to keep this building in top shape—he’s like a one-man army. I don’t know how he does it, but I truly appreciate his hard work, along with the dedication of the office staff. That’s why I’ll continue renewing my lease here. Why move when you have the perfect maintenance team and staff in the building?
reviews.response_text: Hi Beverly, Thank you for the amazing shout-out to Brian! We're so proud of the work that he does and are delighted that he's made your time here so worry-free. We'll be sure to pass the praise along. It will make his day!

reviews.author: Nancy Lopez
reviews.text: Brian is a excellent team member at aspire always willing to help with resident and vendor needs! He is always with the best attitude at work, his  good energy seeps through the room! I can’t thank him enough for all the help he’s given me.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your feedback on your experience with Brian!  We are happy that he has been able to help you so well! We'll be sure to pass along the praise.

reviews.author: Trevor Merrill
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your 5 stars Trevor!  We're glad your experience has been stellar!

reviews.author: Tara Gilbert
reviews.text: Brian does an amazing job keeping the property clean and organized. He takes pride in his job as if the place is his home. He is very friendly and dependable, doesn't matter what the problem is, he alway shows up.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for giving Brian 5 stars! We are thrilled that he has made your time here a little better. We know this place is YOUR home so if you ever need anything, we're here to help!

reviews.author: Rachel Ro Bear
reviews.response_text: Thank you for sharing your experience with Aspire 7th & Grant, Rachel!

reviews.author: Reverie K
reviews.text: Beautiful property! The management staff answered all the questions I had with knowledgeable kindness.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your kind words Reverie!  We are always happy to help with any questions!

reviews.author: Joy Carletti
reviews.text: Phenomenal building that is secure, *pet-friendly* and has just the best community space. You can sit there for hours and work while you drink in great views, comfy couches, and the convenience of a conference room. Makes WFH seem much more official when you need it to, and feel far more relaxing when you need it to!
reviews.response_text: Hello Joy!  We are so glad you are enjoying the lounge area!  We are always here if there's anything we can do to make the space more useful for your work from home needs.

reviews.author: Devan Meck
reviews.text: The leasing team here is amazing. Chloe has always been kind and helpful with all of my questions.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for your feedback, Devan!  We are always here to help should you ever have more!

reviews.author: Robert Anderson
reviews.text: 10/10 excellent!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for leaving a review Robert!  We are always here if you need anything!

reviews.author: Sierra Smurlolee
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your feedback Sierra!  We're happy to help and glad that you have enjoyed your time here!

reviews.author: Austin Card
reviews.text:
My experience as Aspire has been fantastic from start to finish.

A big thank you to the team for their exceptional support throughout my time there—they truly went above and beyond to make the experience top notch.

The apartments and building/amenities were modern, well-maintained, and in an ideal location, making it a wonderful place to call home. I’m grateful for the amazing team and would highly recommend Aspire 7th and Grant to anyone considering living there!
reviews.response_text: Hi Austin, Thank you for the kind words and recommendation! We are always happy to hear that we are delivering on our commitment to create a wonderful place to live.

reviews.author: Erin Arick
reviews.text: Great leasing team!!! Made the process super smooth and answer every single question. I worked with Tommy and he was awesome. Thanks team!
reviews.response_text: Thanks for your feedback Erin!  We're so glad Tommy was able to make your move-in process as stress-free as possible. If you ever need anything we're here for you!

reviews.author: Sappskull
reviews.text: I’m so happy to have Brian, the maintenance supervisor, back in the building! He does an amazing job, and it’s great to have him here again!
reviews.response_text: We are excited to have Brian back too!  He's leading a great maintenance team and we are here for you should you need anything.  Thanks for leaving your feedback!

reviews.author: Will Kos (Will)
reviews.text: Sleek and clean building with great views of the city and mountains! Staff members are all so helpful and friendly and the amenities are great! Brian and Michael in maintenance are quick and thorough. Tommy and Chloe in the office are also very helpful whenever I need them.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you Will, We're glad your experience has been so positive at Aspire 7th & Grant. Our team takes pride in providing remarkable customer service for our residents. We look forward to serving you for many more years to come!
Cheers,
The Aspire Team

reviews.author: Havilande Lodge
reviews.text: Incredible and professional staff! I couldn’t recommend them enough!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your kind words! We appreciate your feedback and are excited to keep providing exceptional service for you and all our residents!

reviews.author: Dave Nelson
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your feedback Dave. We are sorry that your experience with Aspire did not meet your expectations. We are not able to find you in our system as a resident, but would love the opportunity to help if we can. Please feel free to reach out to our team at AspireLeasing@kairoi.com if there is anything we can address to improve your experience.

reviews.author: Lloyd McKenzie
reviews.text: Great support throughout!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your review, Lloyd Mckenzie! We're glad to hear you had a great experience with our support at Aspire 7th & Grant.

reviews.author: Antonio Ayala
reviews.text: Harvest has been amazing to live at for the last 2.5 years and having just recently renewed im looking forward to remaining. Like any luxury complex, there are always the highs and lows. I would have to say under the new management of Kairoi the apartment complex has undergone many great improvements. From an increase in community events, to maintaining communication with residents, and improved maintenance. Overall residents are friendly and welcoming easy to converse and get to know or simply say hello to.  Great community structure all around.

reviews.author: Taylor Fan
reviews.text: I moved into Harvest last month and have had a wonderful experience. The office and maintenance staff are kind and helpful. I’ve never lived in an apartment complex that has a regular cleaning staff, but Harvest does. Hallway floors, windows, and communal spaces get regularly mopped, vacuumed, and dusted. It’s so nice to live in a building that is well-maintained and respected. All of the residents who live near me are friendly, quiet, and respectful. There are resident events so you can get to know your neighbors. The location is great too! I’m so glad I moved here.

reviews.author: Tommy
reviews.text: Absolute amazing team! From the tour with Duncan to working with Wyatt, everyone was great and the residence is gorgeous. 12/10. Don’t settle paying high prices for average apartment when you can move here
reviews.response_text: Hi Tommy! Thank you for the 5-star review and the 12/10 rating—we’ll take that all day. We’re thrilled to hear you had such a great experience from your tour with Duncan through working with Wyatt, and that the community made a strong impression. We agree—no reason to settle when you can have a gorgeous home and an amazing team. Welcome to Harvest, and thank you for the kind words!

reviews.author: Emilio Vinzon (Emilio)
reviews.text:
I’ve really enjoyed living at Harvest Apartments. The community is quiet, well maintained, and feels safe. The apartments are modern and comfortable, and the common areas are always clean.

The management team is responsive and professional, and maintenance requests are handled quickly, which makes a big difference. I also appreciate the location — it’s convenient and close to everything I need.

Overall, it’s been a great place to call home, and I would definitely recommend Harvest to anyone looking for a comfortable and well-managed apartment community.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the 5-star review and for sharing your experience at Harvest. We’re glad to hear you’ve enjoyed the quiet, well-maintained atmosphere and that the community feels safe and comfortable. It’s great to know our team’s responsiveness and quick maintenance support have made a difference, and that the location has been convenient for you as well. We truly appreciate the recommendation and are grateful to have you as part of the Harvest community!

reviews.author: Jhennifer Mendes
reviews.text:
I’ve been living at Harvest for almost 2 years now, and I can honestly say it has been a wonderful experience. From day one, the community has felt welcoming, safe, and well cared for, and it
truly feels like home.

The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, always willing to go the extra mile. I especially want to give a big thank you to Duncan — he’s amazing and always ready to help with anything you need, which really makes life here easier and more enjoyable.

The property is well maintained, the apartments are comfortable, and the overall atmosphere is calm and pleasant. I’ve enjoyed living here so much that I plan to renew my lease again next year without hesitation.

I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great place to live with an awesome community and supportive staff.
reviews.response_text: Hi Jhennifer! Thank you so much for the thoughtful 5-star review and for calling Harvest home for nearly two years—we truly appreciate your loyalty. We’re thrilled to hear that the community feels welcoming, safe, and well cared for, and that it genuinely feels like home. That’s exactly the experience we strive to create. A special thank you for recognizing Duncan—he’ll be glad to know his support has made such a positive impact. We’re also happy to hear you’ve enjoyed the maintenance, comfort of your apartment, and the calm atmosphere throughout the community. We’re honored that you plan to renew again next year and are grateful to have you as part of the Harvest community. Thank you for the recommendation and for being such a valued resident.

reviews.author: Mandi Williams
reviews.text: I recently moved into this property. I love it! The apartment is very spacious, modern and I love the back splash in the kitchen. Ive really been enjoying the outdoor lounge areas as well. The property manager Whitley has been wonderful, so helpful, informative and quick to respond. It's nice having a property manager that actually cares and listens.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for the five-star review! We’re thrilled to hear you’re loving your new home—from the spacious, modern layout to that kitchen backsplash (it is a favorite 😉).
We’re also glad you’re getting good use out of the outdoor lounge areas—those were designed to be enjoyed, not just admired. And thank you for the kind words about Whitley. Providing responsive, thoughtful support is always the goal, and it means a lot to know it’s being felt. Welcome home, and thank you for being part of our community!

reviews.author: Александр Манкевич
reviews.text:
We have been living at Harvest Apartments for over a year now, and my wife, our small child, and I truly enjoy living here. It’s a comfortable, peaceful, and family-friendly place to call home.

The location is very convenient and quiet, which is especially important for us as a family with a young child. The management team is excellent — always friendly, professional, and quick to help with any requests.

The community offers many great amenities, including a well-equipped gym, a jacuzzi, and cozy relaxation rooms. Everything is well maintained and thoughtfully designed for residents’ comfort.

We highly recommend Harvest Apartments to anyone looking for a calm and pleasant place to live.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the five-star review and for being part of the Harvest community for over a year now. It means a lot to hear that you, your wife, and your little one feel comfortable and at home here—that’s exactly the kind of environment we strive to create. We’re glad the quiet, convenient location is working well for your family and that the team has been friendly, professional, and responsive when you’ve needed support. It’s also great to hear you’re enjoying the amenities—from the gym to the jacuzzi and relaxation spaces. We put a lot of care into keeping everything well maintained and resident-focused. Thank you for the recommendation and for choosing Harvest as your home. We truly appreciate having your family as part of our community.

reviews.author: Diana Germanov
reviews.text: Helpful and responsive staff, fun community events, and super clean common areas inside and out!
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the five-star review! We’re so happy to hear you’re enjoying the helpful, responsive team, our community events, and the cleanliness of the common areas—inside and out (our standards are high, on purpose). It was also so great seeing your artistic skills at last week’s Holiday Atelier: A Modern Garland Party. Your garland was absolutely adorable—clearly creativity is one of your talents. We love when residents bring that kind of energy to our events. Thanks for being such a wonderful part of our community. We’re already looking forward to the next event!

reviews.author: Chawn Diaz
reviews.text: I’ve lived at harvest since October of 2025 and have loved it. The old management was good and the new one is even better, so much so that I’ve decide to resign my lease and continue living here. The property team is fast, responsive, and reliable. Not to mention the lengths they go to to make harvest a fun and inviting place live by setting up community events like candle making classes, yoga sessions and my personal favorite, the FriYay sips. If you’re looking for a nice quiet, safe and friendly community, this is the place for you.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the great review—and for choosing to renew your lease with us. That’s the highest compliment we can get. We’re really glad to hear you’ve had a positive experience both before and after the management transition and that the current team’s responsiveness and reliability have stood out. Creating a community that’s not just well-run, but genuinely enjoyable to live in, is a big priority for us. We love that you’re enjoying the events—candle making, yoga, and yes… FriYay Sips tends to be a crowd favorite for a reason. Thank you for recommending Harvest as a quiet, safe, and friendly place to live. We’re grateful to have you as part of the community and look forward to many more good times ahead.

reviews.author: Jim Russell
reviews.text:
Melissa and I just moved into Harvest Apartments and it’s been an awesome experience so far. From day one, the staff has been genuinely helpful and easy to work with—especially Duncan and Wyatt. They made the move-in process smooth, answered every question we had, and have continued to be super responsive any time we need anything.

The building itself feels clean, well cared for, and the design/decor is modern without trying too hard—really comfortable and welcoming. The amenities have been a huge bonus too. The common areas are great for relaxing (TV lounges, firepits, and plenty of seating), and having BBQ grills, a pool and hot tub, plus a solid fitness center makes it feel like you’re getting perks you’ll actually use—not just “nice on paper.”

We’ve also been impressed with maintenance. They’ve been quick to fix things and communication has been clear the whole time. It’s always easy to get ahold of the team, which is honestly rare these days.

Location-wise, it’s hard to beat—close to Temple Square and all the downtown Salt Lake attractions. And inside the apartment, it’s surprisingly quiet. We feel safe here and really happy with our choice. Highly recommend Harvest if you’re looking for a clean, modern place with great staff and amenities.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for the five-star review and for sharing such thoughtful feedback. We’re thrilled to hear that your experience at Harvest Apartments has been a strong one right from day one.

It’s great to know Duncan and Wyatt helped make your move-in smooth and continue to be responsive and easy to work with—that level of service is exactly what we aim for. We’re also glad the community’s modern design, cleanliness, and amenities are living up to expectations (the kind you actually use, not just admire). Hearing that maintenance has been prompt and communicative, the apartments feel quiet and secure, and the location is working well for your lifestyle really seals the deal for us. We’re so happy you and Melissa feel at home here and confident in your choice. Welcome to Harvest, and thank you again for the recommendation—we’re glad to have you as part of the community.

reviews.author: Meghan Robinson
reviews.text: I moved into Harvest sight unseen almost 2 years ago and I couldn't be happier with my choice. The location is great because you are close enough to downtown, but also get the quiet of a neighborhood and easy access to 15! The leasing office and maintenance staff are very friendly and welcoming - it's been a great place to live!
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the five-star review and for being such a wonderful part of the Harvest community for nearly two years now. We truly appreciate your support—it means more to us than you know. We’re so glad the location has been the perfect balance of convenience and calm, and that our leasing and maintenance teams have helped make Harvest feel like home. And of course, we have to give a special shout-out to one of our community favorites—your fur baby, Bixby.  We absolutely love seeing you both and look forward to your daily stop-bys for Bixby’s afternoon sweet treat. Thank you again for choosing Harvest and for bringing such great energy (and paws) to our community.

reviews.author: Tiffany Moza
reviews.text: 🏠 I'm loving this apartment community and I think you might too! This Harvest community is a great place to live - it's quiet, friendly, and the leasing office is super helpful. I'd love to invite you to join our community! If you're interested in learning more, feel free to reach out to them or stop by the leasing office. They're always happy to chat and answer any questions you might have.
reviews.response_text: Hi Tiffany! Thank you so much for the 5-star review and the kind words! We’re thrilled to hear you’re enjoying the Harvest community and that our team has been helpful. Creating a quiet, welcoming place to call home is exactly what we aim for, and it means a lot to know that’s been your experience. We truly appreciate you being part of our community and for sharing the love with others!

reviews.author: Robin Nelson
reviews.text: I love living here! Everyone is so nice, the layout of my place is great, and the gym is awesome.
reviews.response_text: Hi Robin! Thank you for the 5-star review! We’re so glad to hear you’re loving your home, the layout, and the overall community. And yes—the gym really is a standout. We’re especially proud of it since adding the mirrors; they’ve completely elevated the space and made workouts even better. Thanks for being part of Harvest—we’re lucky to have you!

reviews.author: Colby Earl
reviews.text: We have lived here for over 16 months and we couldn’t be happier with it. The management responds in a very timely manner and they seem to actually care. The location is great and the community is even better. Not a bad once to live 😎
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the 5-star review and for calling Harvest home for over 16 months—that means a lot to us. We’re glad our team’s responsiveness and care have stood out, and we couldn’t agree more about the location and the community. We truly appreciate you being part of Harvest and are grateful you chose to stay with us!

reviews.author: navya tushara
reviews.text: Been here for 5 months. Love the location, maintenance and interactive activities at the apartment. Great experience living here!
reviews.response_text: Hi Navya! Thank you so much for the 5-star review! We remember your move-in day—it was a bit hectic, occurring on the day of management transition, so we really appreciate your patience and understanding. We’re thrilled to hear you’re enjoying the location, maintenance support, and our community activities. It’s great having you as part of Harvest!

reviews.author: B M
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the 5-star review! We’re thrilled to hear you’re enjoying your experience at Harvest Apartments. Our team works hard to make this a comfortable, welcoming community, and feedback like yours means the world to us. If you ever need anything, please don’t hesitate to reach out to the leasing office—we’re always here to help!

reviews.author: Logan Howard
reviews.text: They took care of me each step of the way moving in. Great attention to detail.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We’re thrilled to hear that our team was able to support you through every step of your move-in. Providing attentive, detailed service is something we’re truly proud of, and we’re glad it made your experience a great one. Welcome home to Harvest Apartments—please let us know if there’s anything you need as you get settled in!

reviews.author: Geraldine Ocaranza
reviews.text:
I just had my first night here, and I’m really disappointed by how noisy the apartment is. The master room’s window is so thin it feels like it’s open, street noise and drafts come right through. Around 6 a.m. a constant tapping started, which I believe are the pipes, and it hasn’t stopped (currently 0920). To top everything off the AC sounds like a vacuum.

Duncan was a great salesman and very helpful, so I’d give him 5 stars but the unit’s overall quality is far below what I expected. I’m not looking forward to spending a year in this maddeningly noisy room.

reviews.author: christine Bull
reviews.text:
I’m very pleased with Kairoi
Mgmt. the halls and mailroom are always clean and orderly. The staff especially Duncan are very helpful and always there for you.  They are attempting to do gathering once to twice a month to have us meet other tenants.  I love the peaceful atmosphere overlooking Marmalade Park also.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your review. We're delighted you appreciate our clean facilities, helpful staff like Duncan, and peaceful Marmalade atmosphere!

reviews.author: Dallas Thatcher
reviews.text: The move in process was smooth and painless. Wyatt was as on top of things and made things happen quickly
reviews.response_text: Thank you for sharing your experience. We're glad Wyatt made your move-in smooth and handled everything quickly & we are excited to have you as a Resident at Harvest!

reviews.author: Jarred Ellerbroek
reviews.text: Amazing community, very peaceful and great customer service and hospitality from Duncan in the leasing office.
reviews.response_text: Hi Jared! Thank you for your 5-Star Review! We are o excited to have you as one of our newest resident! We hope to see you tonight at our Fri-YAY Sips Resident Event!

reviews.author: Sunanda Datla
reviews.text: staff were very helpful
reviews.response_text: We greatly appreciate your feedback about our helpful staff. Your experience means everything to us.

reviews.author: Eryn
reviews.response_text: We sincerely value your five-star rating and appreciate you choosing Harvest for your experience.

reviews.author: Emily
reviews.response_text: Your feedback is incredibly valuable. Thank you for sharing your experience with Harvest. If you have any further questions or feedback, please feel free to reach out to us at (888) 321-5172.

reviews.author: Weston Olsen
reviews.text: I’ve been living here a little over a year, and when Kairoi took over I was honestly a little nervous about what the future at Harvest would look like. But I can’t say enough about the team and how much effort they put into the property. Greystar did an okay job, but the difference now is clear. I can walk through clean hallways and community spaces without feeling like I have to tidy them up myself before using them. On top of that, the team has been amazing. They’re always welcoming, professional, and go out of their way to make sure residents feel taken care of.
reviews.response_text: Hi Weston! We can’t thank you enough for sharing this feedback. Transitioning management companies can feel uncertain, so it means a lot to hear that our efforts have made a positive difference in your experience at Harvest. Keeping the community clean, welcoming, and well cared for is something we take pride in, and knowing that it’s been noticed makes the work worthwhile. We’ll be sure to share your kind words with the team—they’ll be thrilled to know their professionalism and care are making an impact. We’re so glad you’re part of the community.

reviews.author: Jessy Scarantino
reviews.response_text: Hi Jessy! We weren’t able to find any record of you as a resident or a prospective resident here at Harvest Apartments, which makes it difficult to understand the reason behind your review. If there’s feedback you were hoping to share—whether related to construction or another experience—we’d truly appreciate the chance to hear more directly. Please reach out to our office so we can discuss.

reviews.author: Morgan Morgan
reviews.response_text: Hi John! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience and leave us a 5-star review! We’re glad to know you’re enjoying the community, and we truly appreciate your support. Please don’t hesitate to reach out if there’s ever anything we can do to make your time at Harvest even better.

reviews.author: Rene G. Bonilla
reviews.text: This place is awesome! Me and my wife have lived here about a year and a half and we love it. The amenities are great. The gym area is nice, the clubhouse and office work spaces are always well kept and really useful. They throw 2-3 fun events every month for the residents as well. And especially with the new management everything has been running smoother. They communicate well and are always ready to answer any questions we have. The fire alarms are always mentioned and it is very annoying when it goes off, but it seems to be less frequent with the new management team and when it has gone off, within 12-16 hours we get an email telling us what happened and what triggered the alarm. I would really recommend this place to anyone looking for an apartment!

reviews.author: Ashley Koch
reviews.text: I’ve lived here for almost a year now and have had a great experience. Maintenance always replies on time and management is super helpful. It’s been a way better property since switching from Greystar. Perfect if you’re a grad student or looking for a quiet area.

reviews.author: Morgan Breheny
reviews.text: I’ve had a great experience living here. The building is well maintained, clean, and feels very safe, which made a big difference for me. The new management has been consistently friendly, professional, and responsive whenever I’ve had questions or needed help. You can tell they genuinely care about the residents.
reviews.response_text: We are elated to hear about your positive experience! Thank you for recognizing our team's care and professionalism.

reviews.author: sara bonilla
reviews.text: My husband and i have lived here for about a year and a half and we have enjoyed every second! We moved here from across the country - never saw the apartment, signed a lease and committed to this community and we have never looked back! We love how quick we are able to communicate with staff and we are really enjoying the new Kairoi management! The amenities are always clean and the coffee bar has been restocked better and better! Heights cares for its residents as best as it can - and we are super grateful!
reviews.response_text: Thank you immensely for choosing Heights at Interlocken! We're thrilled you love our community, team communication, and featured items.

reviews.author: Kathleen Smith
reviews.text: There are a considerable number of owners with reactive dogs on the property; therefore, big piles of dog crap lay along the sidewalks. dog urine stains the front entrances and grounds. fire alarms wake you up monthly.  Not worth the luxury prices currently. It feels like if I paid less, then I wouldn’t care about how stinky and loud this property can be. I moved from a non luxury property, to this luxury property, and Heights simply reeks of dog waste. I’m sorry, but given how animals carry disease, this needs to improve immediately. Thank you.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for sharing your feedback. We understand your concerns and apologize for the disruptions you’ve experienced.

We take pet waste and cleanliness across the community very seriously. Maintaining a clean and sanitary environment is a shared responsibility, and our team actively enforces pet policies, increases grounds monitoring, and responds promptly when concerns are reported. We also encourage residents to report issues as they see them so they can be addressed quickly.

Regarding the fire alarm activation on January 12, the system detected a change in water pressure within the building’s fire suppression system and activated as a safety precaution. The system responded exactly as designed. Our team promptly investigated, confirmed there was no fire or danger, and verified that all systems were functioning properly. At no point were residents at risk. Management is actively working with our service providers to address the underlying cause and reduce the likelihood of future false activations. Resident safety remains our top priority, and we appreciate everyone’s patience as we continue to ensure the reliability of our life-safety systems.

We understand the expectations that come with a luxury community and regret that your experience has not met them. Your feedback is important to us, and we remain committed to making continued improvements.

We’d be happy to speak with you in person to address your concerns. Please reach out at 303-522-5943 or heightsinterlocken@kairoi.com.

– The Team at Heights at Interlocken

reviews.author: Ryan Smith
reviews.text:
Since I have moved in, there have been nearly monthly, or more frequently, apartment wide fire alarms that go off in the dead of night and caused the entire building to be evacuated.

Every time it happens, the complex says that they are looking into it, and they will have a resolution, but even under new management, the problem remains happening at the same consistency.

There is nothing less fun than being woken up by blaring alarms at 2 AM and having to stand outside in the freezing cold over and over again.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for sharing your feedback. We completely understand how disruptive fire alarm activations can be and sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.

Regarding the fire alarm activation on January 12, the system detected a change in water pressure within the building’s fire suppression system and activated as a safety precaution. The system responded exactly as designed. Our team promptly investigated, confirmed there was no fire or danger, and verified that all systems were functioning properly. At no point were residents at risk. Management is actively working with our service providers to address the underlying cause and reduce the likelihood of future false activations. Resident safety remains our top priority, and we appreciate everyone’s patience as we continue to ensure the reliability of our life-safety systems.

We value your comfort and peace of mind, so please don’t hesitate to reach out with any questions or concerns at 303-522-5943 or heightsinterlocken@kairoi.com.

– The Team at Heights at Interlocken

reviews.author: Jean Manirambona
reviews.text: The new management team here has been great. Anthony and Samantha have really made a difference in how it feels to live here. They’re easy to reach, quick to respond, and always helpful when questions come up. Most importantly, they genuinely care. It’s nice living in a community where management is supportive and present. I really appreciate everything they’ve done.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We truly appreciate you taking the time to leave such a thoughtful review. It means a lot to hear that you’ve felt a positive difference, and we’re really glad to know our efforts are making an impact. We genuinely care about our residents and love being part of a community where people feel supported and heard. Thank you again, we’re grateful to have you here!

reviews.author: Bojana Ivanic
reviews.text:
Just moved into the apartment complex and really happy with our experience so far.

The complex is under new management that seems to be handling the property really well. In particular we cannot say enough good things about Anthony. He addressed all of our concerns about previous reviews and was extremely knowledgeable and helpful throughout the entire move-in process.
reviews.response_text: We're absolutely thrilled to hear about your positive experience at Heights at Interlocken. Thank you for sharing your feedback!

reviews.author: Jasper choi
reviews.text:
This is my 4th year at the heights and the Kairoi management team has been a great help so far with no real issues to note. I was particularly impressed by Samantha as she was a true professional with her job and strives for nothing below excellent service to help out all residents the best she can. I also give thanks to the rest of the team such as Anthony, the lady at the front, and the maintenance team who has been nothing but timely with all requests up until now. I am hopeful this management team will continue taking care of the heights to the best of their ability.

This building is old, fire alarms continue to be an infrastructure problem management and residents have to deal with, but all things considered I think this is still a great place to live at. The views continue to take my breath away, and though I wish the trash rooms would be cleaner at times I am still happy to be living at the heights.
reviews.response_text:
Afternoon!

We are truly grateful you have been part of this community for the past three years. Recently, the fire alarm went off due to freezing temperatures, which is not an uncommon occurrence during such weather. Please rest assured that earlier this year, we addressed other concerns regarding the fire system to ensure safety and comfort for all residents. We deeply appreciate any feedback you may have regarding our team. We strive every day to ensure the satisfaction and well-being of our residents.

Heights at Interlocken

reviews.author: J Allen
reviews.text: Gorgeous location!  Great views!  Amazing team in place!
reviews.response_text: We are delighted to hear you loved our gorgeous location, views, and amazing team!

reviews.author: Carys Lee
reviews.text: Beautiful place on a hill with great views!!
reviews.response_text: We are overjoyed to hear you enjoyed the beautiful views from our hilltop location!

reviews.author: M M (Michael)
reviews.text: I would've loved to live here, but I just found out my job is transferring me in February. The community is beautiful, and the staff was fantastic!
reviews.response_text: We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit to Heights at Interlocken. Thank you for your feedback!

reviews.author: Hope Ward
reviews.text:
12/1/25: Fire alarms still not fixed. First cold night of this winter season and they’re back on at 5:30am. Don’t ignore this review and think it will get fixed by the time you move in. I’ve lived here 3 years. Residents and pets traumatized.

12/16/25: Fire alarms triggered yet again. Apparently testing was being done but no email was sent to the community. We are under a fire watch weather warning, and a notice would have helped a ton.
reviews.response_text:
Hi Hope,

Thank you for sharing this. I’m truly sorry you’ve experienced fire alarm issues in the past. I understand how stressful that can be for you and your pets. While we understand there were previous concerns with the fire alarm system, I want to assure you that all necessary precautions were taken to fully address and resolve those issues. We’re happy to report those efforts were successful, and the incident that occurred was an isolated event related to a resident cooking in their kitchen. We also sent a same-day email update to the entire community to keep everyone informed about what happened.

My name is Samantha, the new Community Director, and I’m committed to making our community a comfortable, and enjoyable place for you and your neighbors. Please feel free to reach out to me directly at 303-552-5943 if you’d like to discuss this further or need any additional clarification.

Also, when you have a moment, please stop by our Paws & Perks Bar in the office. I’d love to meet you, and we have a treat waiting for your little one 🐾

Thank you again for your feedback, Hope. We truly appreciate you being part of our community.

reviews.author: William Kosling
reviews.text: The whole office team is outstanding! Shout out to Brian, Gustavo and Kian from the maintenance team for going above and beyond and turning the property around since taking over from the previous management company.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for this amazing 5-star review! We are incredibly proud of our entire Kairoi Krew! Brian, Gustavo, and Kian will be thrilled to hear your kind words. Thank you for recognizing their hard work and dedication. We truly appreciate your support and are so glad you’re seeing the positive changes since the transition. We’re grateful to have you as part of our community!

reviews.author: Guesthouse Coffee Bar
reviews.text: New management team is fantastic!  Samantha, Anthony, and the team were wonderful to work and made our introduction to the community as a new vendor seamless.  The residents were engaging and kind and the community spaces are breathtaking!  Can't wait to continue working with The Heights!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your kind words, Guesthouse Coffee! We are thrilled to hear about your positive experience with our new management team and community spaces.

reviews.author: Saint Romero
reviews.text: I recently Toured Heights at Interlocken and was seriously impressed. The place is clean, the two level gym was awesome, and the staff was super welcoming. If I were apartment hunting, this would be my top pick!
reviews.response_text: We are happy to hear you had a positive experience during your tour at Heights at Interlocken. Thank you for sharing your feedback!

reviews.author: kenna jade (mj)
reviews.text: Definitely worth a look! There’s a new staff team that seems to be taking care of things, very sweet!!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for bringing your feedback regarding your experience at Heights at Interlocken to our attention. We are pleased to learn that you have observed the recent additions to our team.

reviews.author: Tatiana Sosa-Martinez
reviews.text: Love this place and the staff! Couldn’t be happier with my choice!
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We’re thrilled to hear you’re loving your home and our team. We truly appreciate you choosing our community and look forward to continuing to make it a great place for you to live!

reviews.author: Scott Saettel
reviews.text: Julieta and the entire staff have been amazing!
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for recognizing Julieta and our staff! We truly appreciate your kind words about our team.

reviews.author: Jovonne Thomas
reviews.text: 5 Stars !! Estela and Julieta Rock!!
reviews.response_text: Your review is appreciated! Estela and Julieta truly rock at Eden Keller Ranch. Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us.

reviews.author: Adam
reviews.text: Easy and smooth, a cool environment.
reviews.response_text: We're ecstatic to hear you had an easy and smooth experience at Eden Keller Ranch. Thank you for your feedback!

reviews.author: Jaden Wilson
reviews.text: Everyone here was great! Estella & Julieta were very patient and helpful they took really good care of us and got us moved in very quickly. Very upfront and honest with the pricing and even took time out of their way to even reply back to us and help us after hours too. I recommend this place to anyone who’s looking to move it’s very convenient, quiet, clean, and the staff is all great. Great amenities too.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback about Estella and Julieta! We appreciate you recommending our community.

reviews.author: Avis
reviews.text: My daughter shared with me she was given a lease violation from her brother who is my son for visiting her for 15min.. I feel this is a inappropriate lease violation for someone visiting.. the matter was not investigated just a violation.. I feel due to discrimination of my daughters race the matter was not looked into further.. avoid this place if you want peace and want relationships with your family members.. not a family oriented place to be or raise children.. save yourself the humiliation and headache from dealing with racist office personnel
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We take all concerns seriously, especially those involving how policies are applied and how residents and their guests are treated. Our community policies are intended to be applied consistently and respectfully, and discrimination of any kind is not tolerated. If this interaction felt otherwise, we want the opportunity to better understand what occurred.
Because online forums don’t always allow for a full review of the facts, we would appreciate the chance to discuss this matter directly and look into it further. Please contact our management office so we can review the situation and address your concerns appropriately. We value our residents and strive to foster a respectful and welcoming community. Thank you again for bringing this to our attention.

reviews.author: Donel
reviews.text: If you are of color do not move here.. I visited my sister for 15min and she got a lease violation for unauthorized occupant.. mind you this is my first time visiting and was only here for 15min.. she told me they typed her up a lease violation.. what is the point of visitors parking if you cnt have visitors.. very unprofessional and unfair to the residents.. there was no investigation just automatic lease violation.. I will continue to post reviews based on the treatment of my sister.. DO NOT MOVE HERE‼️‼️‼️👀
reviews.response_text: We’re sorry to hear that this experience was frustrating for you and your sister, and we understand how upsetting it can feel when a situation is unexpected or unclear. Our community policies regarding guests and occupancy are intended to be applied consistently and are never based on race or personal characteristics. Discrimination of any kind is not tolerated. If this interaction came across as unfair or unprofessional, we take that seriously and would like the opportunity to review what occurred. Lease notices are typically generated based on reported activity and do not represent a final determination without review. Because online platforms don’t allow us to discuss specific details, we encourage your sister to contact our management office directly in person so we can fully address any misunderstandings. We value respectful communication and strive to maintain a welcoming community for all residents and their families. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

reviews.author: Ari Love
reviews.text:
If you are of color meaning “BLACK” I would NOT  move here, I recently had a fire inspector enter my KITCHEN to change a fire extinguisher green tag &  went to the front office to advice my home smelled like smoke and lied stating he seen residents other than myself in my home.. it’s the holidays my brother lives directly right next door and was visiting me with his son .. 1st off how can someone  briefly step inside your home & assume who lives there ? Secondly are we not allowed to have visitors in the home we rent month to month? Thirdly I have so many candle warmers in my home there is NO WAY POSSIBLE SMOKE WAS SMELLED IN MY HOME & I DONT SMOKE .. I would never suggest anyone moving here they gave me a lease violation for no proof just he say she say and I feel that is racist because I am the only black person in my building blame it on the “black woman”, I feel so uncomfortable I been here 2 months and I am breaking my lease asap !!

& to top that off the fire inspector forgot to mention my fire alarm is broke in this unit but he mentioned all other lies to them .. how sway of that! Save your money !!
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for sharing your experience. We want to be clear that discrimination of any kind is not tolerated in our community. Our policies and inspections are intended to ensure safety and compliance for all residents and are never based on race or personal characteristics. If your experience felt otherwise, we take that concern very seriously.  If there were misunderstandings, incorrect information shared, or maintenance issues—such as a non-functioning fire alarm—this should be reported by the resident to management immediately upon noticing that your device is not working properly.  Because we cannot discuss specific lease matters publicly, we strongly encourage you to contact the management office directly in person so we can thoroughly discuss your concerns and work toward a resolution. Our goal is for every resident to feel safe, respected, and comfortable in their home.
Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

reviews.author: Sergio Llamas
reviews.text: Moved in here about 6 months ago when it was still Elan Keller, the new management team is very friendly. The transition was causing a lot of movement but the leasing office stayed on top of everything. Mr. Ben Willis has been very helpful in multiple occasions. So far so good
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for sharing your experience! We’re thrilled to hear that your past six months have been positive and that the transition has felt smooth for you. Our team truly appreciates your kind words!

We’re especially glad to hear that Ben has been such a help — he’s a rockstar, and we’ll be sure to share your shout-out with him!

Thank you again for taking the time to leave this review. We’re grateful to have you here and are excited to continue providing you with a great living experience!

reviews.author: Amanda Feniza
reviews.text: We loved living here aside from my husband's motorcycle being stolen out of this GATED apartment complex.... gates are supposed to be closed for a reason.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for sharing your feedback. We’re truly sorry to hear about the situation with your husband’s motorcycle — we understand how upsetting and frustrating that must have been.

Since the recent management change, we have not been made aware of any recent reports regarding a motorcycle theft, but we take concerns like this very seriously. 

Regarding the gate, we completely understand your concern. Our access gate system is currently in the process of being upgraded to a new platform, and delays have occurred due to software changes with the new vendor. We know how important a secure, functioning gate is for our residents, and we are working diligently with the vendor to have the system fully operational as quickly as possible.

Thank you again for bringing this to our attention. Your feedback is important, and we’re here to help however we can.

reviews.author: Samari Keaton
reviews.text: I wanted to wait until I was here for a couple of months before I left a review. I moved in 09/2025 and it has been great so far. The only complaint I have is the gate. When I toured, the gate was functioning as it should. But ever since I moved in, it's only been closed about 2 times. I wish that would get fixed quickly because the gate was an amenity I really wanted.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience, and we’re truly glad to hear that your stay has been great so far. We also sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you’ve experienced with the gate.

We want to assure you that we are currently in the process of upgrading the entire access gate system. Unfortunately, the project has taken longer than expected due to recent changes with the vendor’s software, but our team and the vendor are actively working to finalize the installation and ensure everything functions as it should.

We completely understand how important this amenity is, and we appreciate your patience while we get the new system fully up and running. If you have any additional concerns or need anything in the meantime, we’re always here to help!

reviews.author: Stephanie Nessenthaler

reviews.text: Have been living here for 4 years now and never had issues with management but recently have ran into the new female manager as she lives on site and multiple times now and some when her dog is off leash behind my apartment. She does not seem friendly she snoops around your patio and stares. We have had multiple pass by’s with no hello nothing. Her off leash dog has tried to jump into my first floor balcony at my dog and she didn’t have anything to say and allowed her dog to do that as she saw me trying to get my dog inside. First impressions are very important.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your concerns with us — we truly appreciate your feedback.

We want to assure you that the pet in question is often taken to this area to relieve himself away from others, as he has difficulty doing so while on a leash. This location was selected to be distant from other pets and residents, and we always ensure no one else is nearby. All patios in this section of the community are situated on a raised retaining wall, which prevents any pets from being able to access or jump onto another patio.

As part of our regular community walks, we continuously monitor the cleanliness and upkeep of all patios and yards to ensure our shared spaces reflect the high standards we strive for.

If you’d like to discuss this matter further, please feel free to stop by the office and introduce yourself — we’d be happy to speak with you in person. We also missed you at our recent community event where we welcomed residents to meet the team and get to know us better. We hope you can join us next time!

reviews.author: Stephanie Van Sant
reviews.text:
RUN FAST. RUN FAR! I have never been treated so shabbily unprofessionally by a leasing complex or company. Documentation was disregarded. Strong-armed into paying additional fines under threat of credit reporting.

I would leave 0 stars if I could. When I was living at Elan Keller Ranch I had some problems. When I moved in in July of '22 as scheduled, the apartment was not properly cleaned. There were cobwebs, the carpet had stains. I documented this in the move-in inspection form. The door handled to the patio door was not properly affixed, the liner on the door was coming off. There was standing water in the apartment from hosing the stairway.  I left this in review and put work orders in. I had to put multiple work orders in to get these issues addressed - and the cobwebs, and the carpet was never addressed. I even left a documented review. Nothing. I decided to move on.

The next year a very loud family moved in above me rough housing, and loud noises, running children in the middle of the night. I made multiple complaints but this continued. I was told to contact the after hours police liaison, who told me to call 911 if I suspected someone was in danger. No one was to my knowledge (just loud roughhousing, children playing running, jumping at all hours of the night) and so my hands were tied. I continued to make complaints with no resolution.

I moved out in July of '24. I payed about 30% of a month's leasing charges to cover the week that I would be staying. I asked for a summary of charges in advance for the 7 days but they would not furnish me the charges. Not willing to pay a whole month's worth of the lease but not wanting the bank transfer to be marked as late, I estimated the charges at about 30% of the total monthly lease charges (this is the first 7 days out of the month that I was living there before moving out, mind you). I had everything moved out and professionally move-out cleaned by Spruce, the recommended and even sponsored cleaning company of Elan Keller Ranch. Everything was pristine, even the cobwebs were gone. Carpet was the same from move in, but cleaner. No mention of move-out inspection.

When I asked for my deposit back a month later I was told there were charges. The condition sink was devalued and the carpet needed to be replaced because of my use. I showed them the review after moving in - nothing. When I tried to get into touch to ask more questions, and for photos of of the sink, no reply. I called and e-mailed multiple times, nothing. Then I heard from the collection agency. I pointed towards my comments on the move-in inspection - they ignored that. There was nothing I could do because I hadn't set a move-out inspection appointment. I cited "normal wear and tear" clause as it appeared in my lease, as I knew it had had one. They told me they couldn't speak to that but then cited me the part of my lease that told me I needed to make a move-out inspection appoint if I didn't want to be charged after move out. Because the lease was in their online portal and I was no longer a tenant, they would not provide me a copy of my lease to reference this personally. They said I had the option to dispute, but then said in all honesty it would likely not be successful because of the lack of inspection. I had the documentation and they ignored it. I felt strong-armed into paying because I don't have the fees required for an attorney. They also said that this lack of payment had not be reported to the credit agencies YET, implying that if I did not pay they would. When I asked about if the dispute process would somehow be reflected in my credit score, they told me they couldn't answer that as that would be considered legal advice. Awful experience.
reviews.response_text:
Hi Stephanie,

Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback with us. We’re truly sorry to hear about your experience and the challenges you faced during your time at our community. At Elan Keller Ranch, we strive to maintain a high standard of service and ensure each resident feels valued and respected. It’s disappointing to learn that we missed the mark during your stay.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused by unresolved maintenance issues and the difficulties you experienced with noise disturbances. We understand how important a clean and comfortable environment is, and we regret that your initial move-in and the process for resolving maintenance requests did not meet expectations.

Regarding your concerns with the move-out process and final charges, we are here to help and clarify any misunderstandings. We want to ensure transparency in all our policies, including move-out inspections and final billing. If there’s anything we can review further or provide additional documentation on, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our office directly at 855-561-0029.

Thank you again for bringing these matters to our attention. Your feedback is invaluable as we continue to improve our processes and deliver a better experience for all current and future residents.

reviews.author: Heesoo Kim
reviews.response_text: Heesoo Kim - I'm so sorry to hear your experience didn't meet your expectations (or our standards). Our community manager would really like to speak with you about this. Please contact us at elankellerranchmgr@greystar.com as soon as you've got a moment. We look forward to hearing from you.

reviews.author: Heesoo Kim
reviews.text:
우리는 계약기간을 다 채웠고 이사 두 달 전에 해약 통보를 했음에도 이사 당월 렌트비 한 달치를 다 빼내갔고, 다른 지역으로 이사 한 달 후에 오히려 각종 비용을 첨가하여 더 내라는 메일을 받았습니다.
이사 오기 전 모든 것들의 원상 복귀와 청소 상태는 추가 비용이 들지않을 만큼 깨끗이 하고 왔음에도 너무 비양심적인 아파트 측에 항의하는 마음을 전합니다.  이사 나올 때 유의하세요!

🚫🚩🚫🚩🚫
Please be warned with this apartment complex!! I applied here a little over a year ago, and ended up not living here. Fast forward to 7 months later, I received a letter via email and mailbox stating that I owe a random number of $85 to this company and it has been sent to collections. COLLECTIONS!!! After spending money with the application fee (not cheap) and not being a resident of this complex, I still managed to have a collection from this place. I have tried to call the complex with zero attempt of call back or an answered call. PLEASE AVOID THIS PLACE. Take my NON-RESIDENT experience and run! I paid the random fee so my credit wouldn’t be affected, but what a corrupt business. 🚫

Hi Alexis,

Please allow us the opportunity to investigate what led to the charge and collection notice. It’s never our intention to cause distress, and we want to ensure any misunderstandings are resolved quickly. We understand how important this is, and we are committed to addressing the issue.

We want to personally follow up and make sure this is taken care of to your satisfaction.

Thank you for your patience, and we hope to resolve this matter promptly.

Thank you,

-The Elan Keller Ranch Team

reviews.author: Noell Hamilton
reviews.text:
I have lived at Elan Keller for 2 years, and decided not to renew my lease. When I first moved in everyone was so friendly, and welcoming. Some neighbors I’ve met I’m still friends with til this day. A lot of good perks for the area.

In my first year here, it seemed they could never keep a leasing agent. Each time I went into the office it was always someone new. They would never answer the phone, and were rude when they did. The property and the amenities were rarely maintained. Buildings on the inside were dirty from bugs, birds, weather, and people’s trash spillage on the concert. No one would pick up after their dogs, pool furniture continuously broken. The courtesy officer never coming to assist with complaints. If he did respond it would be hours later, or tell you to call the police. It was all very frustrating to live here.

Towards the middle to end of my second year of living here. I believe they brought in Andrea Gallegos. Things then started to change. The property was getting regularly maintained. The grass being cut, building cleanings, pool being cleaned more, consistent valet trash pick ups, etc. Once she arrived I truly stopped complaining to myself and friends that this place was a mess. She might not have been the only person to turn this place around, but for me it seemed like she the main factor. When I would go to the office I would get 2 different answers on a question. Which was frustrating as well. I went to ask her my same questions, and she was very polite along with informative. Ms. Gallegos definitely knows her stuff and cares about her residents. Now my only continuous issue is parking, but a few steps never hurt anyone.

Overall, the property and its management team I feel have come along way. I would recommend to live here.

Pros: close grocery store options, restaurants/bars, walking trails, coffee shops, etc.

Cons: Thin walls, loud neighbors, pet droppings on property, no parking, and right gate continuously broken.
reviews.response_text: Noell Hamilton - thanks for your lovely comments about our team. We'll be sure to let them know they went Beyond Expectations! Thanks again for taking some time to about your visit to Elan Keller Ranch. Be well!

reviews.author: Yina M
reviews.text: My husband and I moved in here a few months ago and it has been nothing but amazing! Anjannette has been extremely helpful and so kind! We love the amenities and the area. They have fun events all the time and food trucks. Huge thank you for making this such a great area!

reviews.author: Kayla Ornellas
reviews.text:
Update: they terminated my renewal after three years and won’t disclose why.

Where do I even begin. I have been a tenant since 2021. So buckle up!

I moved here in 2021 where management was absolutely AMAZING. Sheradon ( I probably spelt her name wrong) was on top of everything, made sure every tenant was having a great experience, catering to people’s needs quickly and efficiently. There was an issue of my upstairs neighbor putting a heavy amount of water onto her floors that leaked thru my ceiling after I just had baby, she had maintenance come fix it right away (Josh is a great maintenance man here. And had the situation settled in no time. ) Then womp womp here comes new management..

I had to move into a two bedroom for more room in a very small amount of time since my lease was ending and I needed more space, Anjanette helped me in a timely manner and made me really happy. When I moved in I noticed my sink was completely cracked .. and just a lot of maintenance issues within the apartment itself. DOCUMENT EVERYTHING. TAKE PICTURES. Do NOT talk to them about it over the phone. WRITE IT ON THE MOVE IN SHEET IF SOMETHING IS WRONG. thank god I had a saved conversation about the sink between the maintenance man on my phone because they were saying I HAD TO PAY FOR IT WHEN I WAS NOT THE ONE WHO DID IT. Saying I had to replace the whole sink and what not… as soon as I showed them that I had proof of the maintenance man saying he was supposed to contact a different contractor to fix it and never did.. they said they would take care of it.. but just resurface it at a cheaper rate for themselves.. how ironic.. I lost all of their trust after that little act.

Parking. GOOD LUCK. It is a war zone. Come 645 if you’re not home (god forbid you work) .. you will not be parking by your complex.. people hog parking spots with multiple cars and guests don’t park outside the gate like they’re supposed to. Also the stickers don’t work half the time for the gate to open. So yep. 👍🏻 not enough parking. That’s my biggest anxiety trigger since living here. Not enough spots(they don’t even have carports near buildings 9/10)

Dog poop. People don’t pick up after their dogs. At all.

Trash valet is a hit or miss (will forget your building completely most of the time)

Get charged with so many fees so be prepared to pay for $300 worth of amenities that aren’t even consistent (random charges every month)

It’s been a year since I’ve lived in my two bedroom and my filter still hasn’t been replaced OH and they want me to pay for a new water filter on my fridge since I’m not a new tenant LOL.

Be prepared to hear conversations thru the wall since the walls are thin and people don’t care about silent hours.

Speeding is also a problem . No one slows down even with kids being out.

I had to renew my lease unfortunately since my other plans of moving fell thru but I will say this, Anjanette did help me renew my lease even after I put in my 60 day notice which I am grateful for. Also Alex is very sweet and actually gets things done as soon as you ask him when you walk into the leasing office. He has helped me with several things and I am also very grateful for his great attitude / customer service.

All in all.. dear lord.. it’s been a ROUGH 3 years.. but the parking situation.. HAS GOT TO CHANGE.

Good luck to anyone who moves in.
reviews.response_text: I'm disappointed to hear this about your experience at Elan Keller Ranch, and will share your feedback with the team so we can take the opportunity to improve. Our community manager would really like to speak with you about this. Please contact us at elankellerranchmgr@greystar.com as soon as you've got a moment. We look forward to hearing from you.

reviews.author: Dawn R
reviews.text:
I recently had a highly unsatisfactory experience working with Andrea Gallegos. From the beginning, it was clear that she lacked the necessary professionalism, competence, and dedication to providing quality customer service. We lost over 400$ in application fees and administrative fees because of their verification system called Snappt but perhaps the most disappointing aspect of my experience was Andrea (manager) indifferent attitude and lack of care. She displayed minimal interest in assisting with error I was having with Snappt if you google the company and read the reviews you can clearly see tons of applicants with the same problem which I tried to explain but she was more concerned with putting her office chair together when I went in . I felt as if I stepped into the 1950s. Honestly, I’m sooooo thankful we dodge the bullet the lack of enthusiasm and effort made me question their commitment to their role and their willingness to provide quality service to residents. I had the pleasure of touring a real luxury complex called Sire Wellington if I was still in the market for an apartment I would definitely choose them please reach out to Victoria and let her know that Dawn referred you , they won’t disappoint!

Update * I responded and sent an email to the one listed below but unfortunately it’s just the apartment manger trolling I’m guessing they have to respond but I assure you nothing was resolved
reviews.response_text: Our community manager would really like to speak with you about this. Please contact us at elankellerranchmgr@greystar.com as soon as you've got a moment. We look forward to hearing from you.

reviews.author: Michael T. Whitehurst
reviews.text: This place is beautiful. However, the teenage car theft is on the rise everywhere in DFW.
reviews.response_text: Michael T. Whitehurst -Thanks for taking the time to do it. I can't lie - of course we love positive reviews, but your honesty gives us the chance to improve, so many thanks to you for taking the time to share!

reviews.author: Cristian Nuques
reviews.text: EKR is a great place to live. Ang and the rest of the team are awesome and very helpful.
reviews.response_text: You're the best! We really appreciate the positive review.

reviews.author: Haley Butler
reviews.text:
After nearly three years of living here and never once complaining there has been someone in our building for months that has been playing loud bass music throughout all hours of the night that is so loud it can be heard through a pillow smashed onto my head and can be heard on my phone videos after echoing into our bedroom. I have multiple emails of these videos from all different dates ranging from 1 in the morning  to sometimes 5 in the morning and sent these after speaking to the manager in person and showing her her exact response was “ wow that is such a deep sound can you send me more videos of it” the only thing she has done is emailed people in our building to ask if it’s them which of course everyone has said no and told us to call the police who can do nothing if they don’t know which exact building it’s coming from. Their only offer was to break our lease or move us into a smaller apartment and told my husband there was nothing else she could do since we’re the only ones being affected by it. We shouldn’t be the ones who have to move because someone else is violating their lease by playing loud music throughout all hours of the night almost every single night. I definitely wouldn’t recommend living here because even though you pay nearly 2,000 a month for a one bedroom apartment and have never had issues before if something “is only affecting you” they will not care at all.

This is an update to this review. Within about an hour of leaving my review I received a call from the manager of Elan Keller Ranch asking why I was “leaving such a nasty review” for her. Nothing about my review was nasty as it was purely stating the situation we have been dealing with and the lack of effort and communication put towards resolving this prolonged noise issue. Not only have I been experiencing severe anxiety the last month due to the lack of sleep, and wondering how much real sleep, if any, my husband and I will be able to get before heading to work the next morning. It has now only been heightened by the manager calling to accuse me of being nasty, and accusing us of not doing our part to stop the noise…utterly ridiculous. This is all very confusing to me considering we have more than a dozen recordings of the noise to prove that the issue is actually occurring including additional recordings at the request of the complex manager, my husband has attempted to knock on multiple door with no one answering the door, and we have repeatedly raised the issue to the manager, an issue which dealing with is well within the scope of responsibility for the manager of an apartment complex. What also makes this ridiculous is the fact that the majority of the communication has been through our emails sent to her which pretty consistently require my husband or I taking the initiative. Responses were typically inconsistent or would only occur as a result of my husband or I going to the front office in person to follow up. These are nice apartments to live in but after experiencing this complete lack of professionalism and effort from the management of the complex I would highly recommend prospective tenants steer clear at all costs. Unfortunately it is not feasible for us to move right now do to our life schedule which we are not able to adjust at the moment or for the foreseeable future, and furthermore shouldn't have to.
reviews.response_text: Hi Haley Butler, we appreciate your honest review. We set a high standard for ourselves, so we are disappointed to hear that your experience with us was not a positive one. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (817) 546-7000. We look forward to hearing from you.

reviews.author: verónica Bravo
reviews.text: Muy lindo todo, disfrutamos el festejo de san valentin, y agradecido con Mrs Johnson Michael

reviews.author: Mountain Queen
reviews.text: I have been feeling very anxious about my move and Jeanine took away all of those feelings. She was so kind and really made me feel at home.

reviews.author: Kristina Harral
reviews.text:
I've been through two property management transitions, and this is the first time that we have had a professional come out to fully address a problem.
After issues with our HVAC in August, We have had a smell in our kids bathroom come back again and again. No matter how much we disinfected and even after the maintenance team came out and re caulked the tub, the smell persisted. Unfortunately even after the maintenance team addressed the caulk, they couldn't smell what my kids and I were talking about.
Michael took this seriously and contracted out, resolving the issue in the upmost professional way. The professionals found some mold and the wall has been replaced now. The maintenance team will be coming out to address the Vent in the bathroom next to prevent this happening again.
Thank you to the new leasing team for responding in the correct way!
reviews.response_text:
Hi Kristina,

We are utterly delighted to hear Michael and our team resolved the issue professionally. Thank you for recognizing our commitment to addressing concerns properly. Compliments to our team like this go a long way and we are so happy to see how happy you are in your home!
